```css
/* VVAULT Cinematic Login - Two Column Layout */

/* Main Container */
.cinematic-login-container {
  min-height: 100vh;
  width: 100vw;
  display: flex;
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
}

/* Background Images */
.cinematic-login-container {
  background-size: cover;
  background-position: center;
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-attachment: fixed;
}

/* Sunset Background - Observatory at Dusk */
.vvault-sunset-bg {
  background-image: url('/assets/vvault_sunset.png');
  background-size: cover;
  background-position: center;
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-attachment: fixed;
}

/* Sunrise Background - Snowy Pine Landscape */
.vvault-sunrise-bg {
  background-image: url('/assets/vvault_sunrise.png');
  background-size: cover;
  background-position: center;
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-attachment: fixed;
}

/* Fallback gradients if images don't load */
.vvault-sunset-bg {
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ff6b35, #f7931e, #ffd23f, #2c3e50);
}

.vvault-sunrise-bg {
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #87ceeb, #ffd700, #ffa500, #ffffff);
}

/* Two Column Layout */
.login-content {
  display: flex;
  width: 100%;
  min-height: 100vh;
  position: relative;
  z-index: 2;
}

/* Left Column - Welcome Section */
.welcome-section {
  flex: 1;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: flex-start;
```
```css
  padding: 60px 80px;
  position: relative;
}

.welcome-section::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
  backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
  z-index: -1;
}

/* Right Column - Form Section */
.form-section {
  flex: 1;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
  padding: 60px 80px;
  position: relative;
}

.form-section::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4);
  backdrop-filter: blur(15px);
  z-index: -1;
}

/* Welcome Text Styling */
.welcome-title {
  font-size: 3.5rem;
  font-weight: 700;
  color: white;
  margin-bottom: 24px;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
  line-height: 1.1;
}

.welcome-subtitle {
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9);
  margin-bottom: 40px;
  line-height: 1.6;
  max-width: 400px;
  text-shadow: 1px 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
}

/* Theme Indicator */
.theme-indicator {
  margin-bottom: 40px;
}

.theme-text {
  font-size: 0.9rem;
```

```css
.vvault-sunrise-bg {
  background-image: url('/assets/vvault_sunrise.png');
  background-size: cover;
  background-position: center;
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-attachment: fixed;
}

/* Fallback gradients if images don't load */
.vvault-sunset-bg {
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ff6b35, #f7931e, #ffd23f, #2c3e50);
}

.vvault-sunrise-bg {
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #87ceeb, #ffd700, #ffa500, #ffffff);
}

/* Two Column Layout */
.login-content {
  display: flex;
  width: 100%;
  min-height: 100vh;
  position: relative;
  z-index: 2;
}

/* Left Column - Welcome Section */
.welcome-section {
  flex: 1;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
  padding: 60px 80px;
  position: relative;
  text-align: center;
}

.welcome-section::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
  backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
  z-index: -1;
}

/* Right Column - Form Section */
.form-section {
  flex: 1;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
  padding: 60px 80px;
  position: relative;
}

.form-section::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4);
  backdrop-filter: blur(15px);
  z-index: -1;
}

/* Welcome Text Styling */
.welcome-title {
  font-size: 3.5rem;
  font-weight: 700;
  color: white;
  margin-bottom: 24px;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
  line-height: 1.1;
}

.welcome-subtitle {
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9);
  margin-bottom: 40px;
  line-height: 1.6;
  text-shadow: 1px 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
}

/* Theme Indicator */
.theme-indicator {
  margin-bottom: 40px;
}

.theme-text {
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8);
  font-style: italic;
  text-shadow: 1px 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
}

/* Social Links */
.social-links {
  display: flex;
  gap: 16px;
  margin-top: auto;
}

.social-icon {
  width: 40px;
  height: 40px;
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  border: 2px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
  border-radius: 50%;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
}

.social-icon:hover {
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
  border-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5);
  transform: translateY(-2px);
}

/* Form Container */
.login-form-container {
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.95);
  backdrop-filter: blur(20px);
  border-radius: 16px;
  padding: 40px;
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 400px;
  box-shadow: 0 20px 40px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
  border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
}

/* Form Styling */
.form-title {
  font-size: 2rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: #333;
  margin-bottom: 32px;
  text-align: center;
}

.form-group {
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.form-label {
  display: block;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  font-weight: 500;
  color: #555;
  margin-bottom: 8px;
}

.form-input {
  width: 100%;
  padding: 12px 16px;
  border: 2px solid #e1e5e9;
  border-radius: 8px;
  font-size: 1rem;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  background: white;
}

.form-input:focus {
  outline: none;
  border-color: #ff6b35;
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 3px rgba(255, 107, 53, 0.1);
}

.form-checkbox {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  margin-bottom: 24px;
}

.form-checkbox input {
  margin-right: 8px;
  transform: scale(1.2);
}

.form-checkbox label {
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  color: #555;
}

/* Buttons */
.btn-primary {
  width: 100%;
  padding: 14px 24px;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ff6b35, #f7931e);
  color: white;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 8px;
  font-size: 1rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.btn-primary:hover {
  transform: translateY(-2px);
  box-shadow: 0 8px 20px rgba(255, 107, 53, 0.4);
}

.btn-primary:disabled {
  opacity: 0.6;
  cursor: not-allowed;
  transform: none;
}

/* OAuth Buttons */
.oauth-section {
  margin-top: 24px;
}

.oauth-divider {
  text-align: center;
  margin: 20px 0;
  color: #666;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  position: relative;
}

.oauth-divider::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  height: 1px;
  background: #e1e5e9;
  z-index: 1;
}

.oauth-divider span {
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.95);
  padding: 0 16px;
  position: relative;
  z-index: 2;
}

.oauth-buttons {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
  gap: 12px;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.btn-oauth {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  padding: 12px 16px;
  border: 2px solid #e1e5e9;
  border-radius: 8px;
  background: white;
  color: #333;
  text-decoration: none;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  font-weight: 500;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  cursor: pointer;
}

.btn-oauth:hover {
  border-color: #ff6b35;
  background: #fff5f0;
  transform: translateY(-1px);
}

.oauth-icon {
  width: 20px;
  height: 20px;
  margin-right: 8px;
}

/* Form Links */
.form-links {
  text-align: center;
  margin-top: 20px;
}

.form-link {
  color: #ff6b35;
  text-decoration: none;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  font-weight: 500;
}

.form-link:hover {
  text-decoration: underline;
}

.form-toggle {
  margin-top: 16px;
  text-align: center;
}

.form-toggle-text {
  color: #666;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}

/* Cloudflare Verification */
.cloudflare-verification {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  padding: 12px 16px;
  background: #f0f8ff;
  border: 2px solid #4CAF50;
  border-radius: 8px;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.cloudflare-icon {
  width: 20px;
  height: 20px;
  margin-right: 8px;
  color: #4CAF50;
}

.cloudflare-text {
  color: #4CAF50;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  font-weight: 500;
}

/* Terms Checkbox */
.terms-checkbox {
  display: flex;
  align-items: flex-start;
  margin-bottom: 24px;
}

.terms-checkbox input {
  margin-right: 12px;
  margin-top: 2px;
  transform: scale(1.2);
}

.terms-checkbox label {
  font-size: 0.85rem;
  color: #666;
  line-height: 1.4;
}

.terms-link {
  color: #ff6b35;
  text-decoration: none;
}

.terms-link:hover {
  text-decoration: underline;
}

/* Responsive Design */
@media (max-width: 1024px) {
  .welcome-section,
  .form-section {
    padding: 40px 60px;
  }
  
  .welcome-title {
    font-size: 3rem;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .login-content {
    flex-direction: column;
  }
  
  .welcome-section {
    padding: 40px 30px;
    text-align: center;
    align-items: center;
  }
  
  .form-section {
    padding: 30px;
  }
  
  .welcome-title {
    font-size: 2.5rem;
  }
  
  .welcome-subtitle {
    max-width: none;
```
```css
  }
  
  .login-form-container {
    padding: 30px;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 480px) {
  .welcome-section,
  .form-section {
    padding: 20px;
  }
  
  .welcome-title {
    font-size: 2rem;
  }
  
  .login-form-container {
    padding: 20px;
  }
  
  .oauth-buttons {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
  }
}

/* Mobile Portrait Background Adjustment */
@media (max-width: 768px) and (orientation: portrait) {
  .cinematic-login-container {
    background-attachment: scroll;
    background-size: cover;
    background-position: center top;
  }
}

/* Loading and Error States */
.loading-overlay {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  z-index: 1000;
}

.loading-spinner {
  width: 40px;
  height: 40px;
  border: 4px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
  border-top: 4px solid #ff6b35;
  border-radius: 50%;
  animation: spin 1s linear infinite;
}

@keyframes spin {
  0% { transform: rotate(0deg); }
  100% { transform: rotate(360deg); }
}

.error-message {
  background: #fee;
  color: #c33;
  padding: 12px 16px;
  border-radius: 8px;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  border: 1px solid #fcc;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}

.success-message {
  background: #efe;
  color: #363;
  padding: 12px 16px;
  border-radius: 8px;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  border: 1px solid #cfc;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
```
```css
}

  background-image: url('/assets/vvault_sunset.png');
  background-size: cover;
  background-position: center;
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-attachment: fixed;
}

/* Sunrise Background - Snowy Pine Landscape */
.vvault-sunrise-bg {
  background-image: url('/assets/vvault_sunrise.png');
  background-size: cover;
  background-position: center;
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-attachment: fixed;
}

/* Fallback gradients if images don't load */
.vvault-sunset-bg {
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ff6b35, #f7931e, #ffd23f, #2c3e50);
}

.vvault-sunrise-bg {
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #87ceeb, #ffd700, #ffa500, #ffffff);
}

/* Two Column Layout */
.login-content {
  display: flex;
  width: 100%;
  min-height: 100vh;
  position: relative;
  z-index: 2;
}

/* Left Column - Welcome Section */
.welcome-section {
  flex: 1;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
  padding: 60px 80px;
  position: relative;
}

.welcome-content {
  text-align: left;
  max-width: 400px;
  width: 100%;
}

.welcome-section::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
  backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
  z-index: -1;
}

/* Right Column - Form Section */
.form-section {
  flex: 1;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
  padding: 60px 80px;
  position: relative;
}

.form-section::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4);
  backdrop-filter: blur(15px);
  z-index: -1;
}

/* Welcome Text Styling */
.welcome-title {
  font-size: 3.5rem;
  font-weight: 700;
  color: white;
  margin-bottom: 24px;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
  line-height: 1.1;
}

.welcome-subtitle {
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9);
  margin-bottom: 40px;
  line-height: 1.6;
  text-shadow: 1px 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
}

/* Theme Indicator */
.theme-indicator {
  margin-bottom: 40px;
}

.theme-text {
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8);
  font-style: italic;
  text-shadow: 1px 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
}

/* Social Links */
.social-links {
  display: flex;
  gap: 16px;
  margin-top: auto;
}

.social-icon {
  width: 40px;
  height: 40px;
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  border: 2px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
  border-radius: 50%;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
}

.social-icon:hover {
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
  border-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5);
  transform: translateY(-2px);
}

/* Form Container */
.login-form-container {
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.95);
  backdrop-filter: blur(20px);
  border-radius: 16px;
  padding: 40px;
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 400px;
  box-shadow: 0 20px 40px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
  border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
}

/* Form Styling */
.form-title {
  font-size: 2rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: #333;
  margin-bottom: 32px;
  text-align: center;
}

.form-group {
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.form-label {
  display: block;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  font-weight: 500;
  color: #555;
  margin-bottom: 8px;
}

.form-input {
  width: 100%;
  padding: 12px 16px;
  border: 2px solid #e1e5e9;
  border-radius: 8px;
  font-size: 1rem;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  background: white;
}

.form-input:focus {
  outline: none;
  border-color: #ff6b35;
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 3px rgba(255, 107, 53, 0.1);
}

.form-checkbox {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  margin-bottom: 24px;
}

.form-checkbox input {
  margin-right: 8px;
  transform: scale(1.2);
}

.form-checkbox label {
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  color: #555;
}

/* Buttons */
.btn-primary {
  width: 100%;
  padding: 14px 24px;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ff6b35, #f7931e);
  color: white;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 8px;
  font-size: 1rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.btn-primary:hover {
  transform: translateY(-2px);
  box-shadow: 0 8px 20px rgba(255, 107, 53, 0.4);
}

.btn-primary:disabled {
  opacity: 0.6;
  cursor: not-allowed;
  transform: none;
}

/* OAuth Buttons */
.oauth-section {
  margin-top: 24px;
}

.oauth-divider {
  text-align: center;
  margin: 20px 0;
  color: #666;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  position: relative;
}

.oauth-divider::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  height: 1px;
  background: #e1e5e9;
  z-index: 1;
}

.oauth-divider span {
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.95);
  padding: 0 16px;
  position: relative;
  z-index: 2;
}

.oauth-buttons {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
  gap: 12px;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.btn-oauth {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  padding: 12px 16px;
  border: 2px solid #e1e5e9;
  border-radius: 8px;
  background: white;
  color: #333;
  text-decoration: none;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  font-weight: 500;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  cursor: pointer;
}

.btn-oauth:hover {
  border-color: #ff6b35;
  background: #fff5f0;
  transform: translateY(-1px);
}

.oauth-icon {
  width: 20px;
  height: 20px;
  margin-right: 8px;
}

/* Form Links */
.form-links {
  text-align: center;
  margin-top: 20px;
}

.form-link {
  color: #ff6b35;
  text-decoration: none;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  font-weight: 500;
}

.form-link:hover {
  text-decoration: underline;
}

.form-toggle {
  margin-top: 16px;
  text-align: center;
}

.form-toggle-text {
  color: #666;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}

/* Cloudflare Verification */
.cloudflare-verification {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  padding: 12px 16px;
  background: #f0f8ff;
  border: 2px solid #4CAF50;
  border-radius: 8px;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.cloudflare-icon {
  width: 20px;
  height: 20px;
  margin-right: 8px;
  color: #4CAF50;
}

.cloudflare-text {
  color: #4CAF50;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  font-weight: 500;
}

/* Terms Checkbox */
.terms-checkbox {
  display: flex;
  align-items: flex-start;
  margin-bottom: 24px;
}

.terms-checkbox input {
  margin-right: 12px;
  margin-top: 2px;
  transform: scale(1.2);
}

.terms-checkbox label {
  font-size: 0.85rem;
  color: #666;
  line-height: 1.4;
}

.terms-link {
  color: #ff6b35;
  text-decoration: none;
}

.terms-link:hover {
  text-decoration: underline;
}

/* Responsive Design */
@media (max-width: 1024px) {
  .welcome-section,
  .form-section {
    padding: 40px 60px;
  }
  
  .welcome-title {
    font-size: 3rem;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .login-content {
    flex-direction: column;
  }
  
  .welcome-section {
    padding: 40px 30px;
    text-align: center;
    align-items: center;
  }
  
  .form-section {
    padding: 30px;
  }
  
  .welcome-title {
    font-size: 2.5rem;
  }
  
  .login-form-container {
    padding: 30px;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 480px) {
  .welcome-section,
  .form-section {
    padding: 20px;
  }
  
  .welcome-title {
    font-size: 2rem;
  }
  
  .login-form-container {
    padding: 20px;
  }
  
  .oauth-buttons {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
  }
}

/* Mobile Portrait Background Adjustment */
@media (max-width: 768px) and (orientation: portrait) {
  .cinematic-login-container {
    background-attachment: scroll;
    background-size: cover;
    background-position: center top;
  }
}

/* Loading and Error States */
.loading-overlay {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  z-index: 1000;
}

.loading-spinner {
  width: 40px;
  height: 40px;
  border: 4px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
  border-top: 4px solid #ff6b35;
  border-radius: 50%;
  animation: spin 1s linear infinite;
}

@keyframes spin {
  0% { transform: rotate(0deg); }
  100% { transform: rotate(360deg); }
}

.error-message {
  background: #fee;
  color: #c33;
  padding: 12px 16px;
  border-radius: 8px;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  border: 1px solid #fcc;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}

.success-message {
  background: #efe;
  color: #363;
  padding: 12px 16px;
  border-radius: 8px;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  border: 1px solid #cfc;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}
```

Now I need to update the JavaScript component to wrap the welcome content in the new container:


```javascript
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react';
import './CinematicLogin.css';

const CinematicLogin = ({ onLogin }) => {
  const [isSignInMode, setIsSignInMode] = useState(true);
  const [isTrustedDevice, setIsTrustedDevice] = useState(false);
  const [formData, setFormData] = useState({
    name: '',
    email: '',
    password: '',
    confirmPassword: '',
    rememberMe: false,
    agreeToTerms: false
  });
  const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(false);
  const [error, setError] = useState('');
  const [cloudflareVerified, setCloudflareVerified] = useState(false);

  // Simulate trusted device detection
  useEffect(() => {
    // In a real app, this would check IP, device fingerprint, localStorage, etc.
    const simulateTrustedDevice = () => {
      const savedDevice = localStorage.getItem('vvault_trusted_device');
      if (savedDevice) {
        setIsTrustedDevice(true);
      } else {
        // Randomly assign for demo purposes
        const isTrusted = Math.random() > 0.5;
        setIsTrustedDevice(isTrusted);
        if (isTrusted) {
          localStorage.setItem('vvault_trusted_device', 'true');
        }
      }
    };

    simulateTrustedDevice();
  }, []);

  const handleInputChange = (e) => {
    const { name, value, type, checked } = e.target;
    setFormData(prev => ({
      ...prev,
      [name]: type === 'checkbox' ? checked : value
    }));
    setError(''); // Clear error on input change
  };

  const handleCloudflareVerification = () => {
    setCloudflareVerified(true);
  };

  const validateForm = () => {
    if (!formData.email || !formData.password) {
      setError('Email and password are required.');
      return false;
    }

    if (!isSignInMode) {
      if (!formData.name) {
        setError('Name is required.');
        return false;
      }
      if (formData.password !== formData.confirmPassword) {
        setError('Passwords do not match.');
        return false;
      }
      if (!formData.agreeToTerms) {
        setError('You must agree to the Terms of Service and Privacy Notice.');
        return false;
      }
      if (!cloudflareVerified) {
        setError('Please complete the human verification.');
        return false;
      }
    }

    return true;
  };

  const handleSubmit = async (e) => {
    e.preventDefault();
    
    if (!validateForm()) {
      return;
    }

    setIsLoading(true);
    setError('');

    try {
      // Simulate API call
      await new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, 1500));

      // Mock authentication logic
      const userData = {
        email: formData.email,
        name: formData.name || formData.email.split('@')[0],
        role: 'user'
      };

      // Store user session
      localStorage.setItem('vvault_user', JSON.stringify(userData));
      localStorage.setItem('vvault_token', 'mock-token-' + Date.now());
      
      // Call parent callback
      onLogin(userData);
    } catch (err) {
      setError('Authentication failed. Please try again.');
    } finally {
      setIsLoading(false);
    }
  };

  const handleOAuth = (provider) => {
    // Simulate OAuth flow
    console.log(`OAuth login with ${provider}`);
    // In a real app, this would redirect to OAuth provider
  };

  const backgroundImage = isTrustedDevice ? 'vvault_sunrise.png' : 'vvault_sunset.png';
  const backgroundTheme = isTrustedDevice ? 'Familiarity. Belonging. Trusted Return.' : 'Ceremony. Recognition of Arrival.';

  return (
    <div 
      className={`cinematic-login-container ${isTrustedDevice ? 'vvault-sunrise-bg' : 'vvault-sunset-bg'}`}
    >
      <div className="login-content">
        <div className="welcome-section">
          <div className="welcome-content">
            <h1 className="welcome-title">
              {isTrustedDevice ? 'Welcome Back' : 'Welcome to VVAULT'}
            </h1>
            <p className="welcome-subtitle">
              {isTrustedDevice 
                ? 'Secure your constructs. Remember forever. Your trusted vault awaits.'
                : 'It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using'
              }
            </p>
            <div className="theme-indicator">
              <span className="theme-text">{backgroundTheme}</span>
            </div>
            
            <div className="social-links">
              <div className="social-icon">üìò</div>
              <div className="social-icon">üê¶</div>
              <div className="social-icon">üì∑</div>
              <div className="social-icon">üì∫</div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>

        <div className="form-section">
          <div className="login-form-container">
            <h2 className="form-title">
              {isSignInMode ? 'Sign in' : 'Create Account'}
            </h2>

            <form onSubmit={handleSubmit}>
              {!isSignInMode && (
                <div className="form-group">
                  <label htmlFor="name" className="form-label">Name</label>
                  <input
                    type="text"
                    id="name"
                    name="name"
                    value={formData.name}
                    onChange={handleInputChange}
                    className="form-input"
                    placeholder="Your name"
                    disabled={isLoading}
                  />
                </div>
              )}

              <div className="form-group">
                <label htmlFor="email" className="form-label">Email Address</label>
                <input
                  type="email"
                  id="email"
                  name="email"
                  value={formData.email}
                  onChange={handleInputChange}
                  className="form-input"
                  placeholder="Enter your email"
                  disabled={isLoading}
                />
              </div>

              <div className="form-group">
                <label htmlFor="password" className="form-label">Password</label>
                <input
                  type="password"
                  id="password"
                  name="password"
                  value={formData.password}
                  onChange={handleInputChange}
                  className="form-input"
                  placeholder="Enter your password"
                  disabled={isLoading}
                />
              </div>

              {!isSignInMode && (
                <div className="form-group">
                  <label htmlFor="confirmPassword" className="form-label">Confirm Password</label>
                  <input
                    type="password"
                    id="confirmPassword"
                    name="confirmPassword"
                    value={formData.confirmPassword}
                    onChange={handleInputChange}
                    className="form-input"
                    placeholder="Confirm your password"
                    disabled={isLoading}
                  />
                </div>
              )}

              {isSignInMode && (
                <div className="form-checkbox">
                  <input
                    type="checkbox"
                    name="rememberMe"
                    checked={formData.rememberMe}
                    onChange={handleInputChange}
                    disabled={isLoading}
                  />
                  <label htmlFor="rememberMe">Remember Me</label>
                </div>
              )}

              {!isSignInMode && (
                <div className="terms-checkbox">
                  <input
                    type="checkbox"
                    name="agreeToTerms"
                    checked={formData.agreeToTerms}
                    onChange={handleInputChange}
                    disabled={isLoading}
                  />
                  <label htmlFor="agreeToTerms">
                    By continuing, I confirm I understand and agree to the{' '}
                    <a href="#" className="terms-link">VVAULT Terms of Service</a> and the{' '}
                    <a href="#" className="terms-link">VVAULT Privacy Notice</a>.
                  </label>
                </div>
              )}

              {!isSignInMode && (
                <div className="cloudflare-verification">
                  <div className="cloudflare-icon">‚úÖ</div>
                  <span className="cloudflare-text">Human verification complete</span>
                </div>
              )}

              <button
                type="submit"
                className="btn-primary"
                disabled={isLoading}
              >
                {isLoading ? 'Processing...' : (isSignInMode ? 'Sign in now' : 'Create account')}
              </button>

              {error && <div className="error-message">{error}</div>}

              <div className="oauth-section">
                <div className="oauth-divider">
                  <span>or</span>
                </div>

                <div className="oauth-buttons">
                  <button
                    type="button"
                    onClick={() => handleOAuth('Google')}
                    className="btn-oauth"
                    disabled={isLoading}
                  >
                    <span className="oauth-icon">G</span>
                    Continue with Google
                  </button>
                  <button
                    type="button"
                    onClick={() => handleOAuth('Microsoft')}
                    className="btn-oauth"
                    disabled={isLoading}
                  >
                    <span className="oauth-icon">‚äû</span>
                    Continue with Microsoft
                  </button>
                  <button
                    type="button"
                    onClick={() => handleOAuth('Apple')}
                    className="btn-oauth"
                    disabled={isLoading}
                  >
                    <span className="oauth-icon">üçé</span>
                    Continue with Apple
                  </button>
                  <button
                    type="button"
                    onClick={() => handleOAuth('GitHub')}
                    className="btn-oauth"
                    disabled={isLoading}
                  >
                    <span className="oauth-icon">üêô</span>
                    Continue with GitHub
                  </button>
                </div>
              </div>

              <div className="form-links">
                {isSignInMode ? (
                  <>
                    <a href="#" className="form-link">Lost your password?</a>
                    <div className="form-toggle">
                      <span className="form-toggle-text">
                        Don't have an account?{' '}
                        <button
                          type="button"
                          onClick={() => setIsSignInMode(false)}
                          className="form-link"
                        >
                          Create one
                        </button>
                      </span>
                    </div>
                  </>
                ) : (
                  <div className="form-toggle">
                    <span className="form-toggle-text">
                      Already have an account?{' '}
                      <button
                        type="button"
                        onClick={() => setIsSignInMode(true)}
                        className="form-link"
                      >
                        Sign in
                      </button>
                    </span>
                  </div>
                )}
              </div>
            </form>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  );
};

export default CinematicLogin;
```

```css
  margin-top: auto;
}

.social-icon {
  width: 40px;
  height: 40px;
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  border: 2px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
  border-radius: 50%;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
}

.social-icon:hover {
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
  border-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5);
  transform: translateY(-2px);
}

/* Form Container */
.login-form-container {
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.95);
  backdrop-filter: blur(20px);
  border-radius: 16px;
  padding: 40px;
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 400px;
  box-shadow: 0 20px 40px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
  border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
}

/* Form Styling */
.form-title {
  font-size: 2rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: #333;
  margin-bottom: 32px;
  text-align: center;
}

.form-group {
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.form-label {
  display: block;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  font-weight: 500;
  color: #555;
  margin-bottom: 8px;
}

.form-input {
  width: 100%;
  padding: 12px 16px;
  border: 2px solid #e1e5e9;
  border-radius: 8px;
  font-size: 1rem;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  background: white;
}

.form-input:focus {
  outline: none;
  border-color: #ff6b35;
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 3px rgba(255, 107, 53, 0.1);
}

.form-checkbox {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  margin-bottom: 24px;
}

.form-checkbox input {
  margin-right: 8px;
  transform: scale(1.2);
}

.form-checkbox label {
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  color: #555;
}

/* Buttons */
.btn-primary {
  width: 100%;
  padding: 14px 24px;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ff6b35, #f7931e);
  color: white;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 8px;
  font-size: 1rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.btn-primary:hover {
  transform: translateY(-2px);
  box-shadow: 0 8px 20px rgba(255, 107, 53, 0.4);
}

.btn-primary:disabled {
  opacity: 0.6;
  cursor: not-allowed;
  transform: none;
}

  margin-top: 24px;
}

  text-align: center;

  position: relative;
}

.oauth-icon {
  width: 20px;

}

/* Form Links */
.form-links {
  text-align: center;

}

.form-link {

  100% { transform: rotate(360deg); }
}

.error-message {
  background: #fee;
  color: #c33;

  border: 1px solid #fcc;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}

.success-message {

  color: #363;

  border-radius: 8px;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  border: 1px solid #cfc;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}
```

## ‚úÖ **Left-Aligned Text in Center Position:**

### **üéØ What This Achieves:**

1. **Container Centering**: The `.welcome-section` uses `align-items: center` to center the content container horizontally in the left column
2. **Text Left-Aligned**: The `.welcome-content` wrapper has `text-align: left` so all text is left-aligned within its container
3. **Constrained Width**: The content has `max-width: 400px` to prevent it from stretching too wide
4. **Perfect Positioning**: The text block is centered in the left half of the screen but the text itself is left-aligned

### **üì± Responsive Behavior:**

- **Desktop**: Left-aligned text block centered in the left column
- **Mobile**: Switches to center-aligned text for better mobile UX
- **All Sizes**: Maintains proper spacing and visual balance

### **üé® Visual Result:**

- **"Welcome to VVAULT"** title is left-aligned within a centered container
- **Subtitle text** flows naturally with left alignment
- **Theme indicator** and **social icons** are also left-aligned
- **Overall positioning** creates perfect balance with the right-side form

The text now appears left-aligned but is positioned in the center of the left column, giving you the exact layout you wanted! üéØ‚ú®

```css
  bottom: 0;
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
  backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
  z-index: -1;
}

/* Right Column - Form Section */
.form-section {
  flex: 1;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
  padding: 60px 80px;
  position: relative;
}

.form-section::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4);
  backdrop-filter: blur(15px);
  z-index: -1;
}

/* Welcome Text Styling */
.welcome-title {
  font-size: 3.5rem;
  font-weight: 700;
  color: white;
  margin-bottom: 24px;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
  line-height: 1.1;
}

.welcome-subtitle {
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9);
  margin-bottom: 40px;
  line-height: 1.6;
  text-shadow: 1px 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
}

/* Theme Indicator */
.theme-indicator {
  margin-bottom: 40px;
}

.theme-text {
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8);
  font-style: italic;
  text-shadow: 1px 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
}

/* Social Links */
.social-links {
  display: flex;
  gap: 16px;
  margin-top: auto;
}

.social-icon {
  width: 40px;
  height: 40px;
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  border: 2px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
  border-radius: 50%;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
}

.social-icon:hover {
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
  border-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5);
  transform: translateY(-2px);
}

/* Form Container */
.login-form-container {
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 400px;
}

/* Form Styling */
.form-title {
  font-size: 2rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: #333;
  margin-bottom: 32px;
  text-align: center;
}

.form-group {
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.form-label {
  display: block;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  font-weight: 500;
  color: #555;
  margin-bottom: 8px;
}

.form-input {
  width: 100%;
  padding: 12px 16px;
  border: 2px solid #e1e5e9;
  border-radius: 8px;
  font-size: 1rem;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  background: white;
}

.form-input:focus {
  outline: none;
  border-color: #ff6b35;
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 3px rgba(255, 107, 53, 0.1);
}

.form-checkbox {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  margin-bottom: 24px;
}

.form-checkbox input {
  margin-right: 8px;
  transform: scale(1.2);
}

.form-checkbox label {
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  color: #555;
}

/* Buttons */
.btn-primary {
  width: 100%;
  padding: 14px 24px;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ff6b35, #f7931e);
  color: white;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 8px;
  font-size: 1rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.btn-primary:hover {
  transform: translateY(-2px);
  box-shadow: 0 8px 20px rgba(255, 107, 53, 0.4);
}

.btn-primary:disabled {
  opacity: 0.6;
  cursor: not-allowed;
  transform: none;
}

/* OAuth Buttons */
.oauth-section {
  margin-top: 24px;
}

.oauth-divider {
  text-align: center;
  margin: 20px 0;
  color: #666;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  position: relative;
}

.oauth-divider::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  height: 1px;
  background: #e1e5e9;
  z-index: 1;
}

.oauth-divider span {
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.95);
  padding: 0 16px;
  position: relative;
  z-index: 2;
}

.oauth-buttons {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
  gap: 12px;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.btn-oauth {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  padding: 12px 16px;
  border: 2px solid #e1e5e9;
  border-radius: 8px;
  background: white;
  color: #333;
  text-decoration: none;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  font-weight: 500;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  cursor: pointer;
}

.btn-oauth:hover {
  border-color: #ff6b35;
  background: #fff5f0;
  transform: translateY(-1px);
}

.oauth-icon {
  width: 20px;
  height: 20px;
  margin-right: 8px;
}

/* Form Links */
.form-links {
  text-align: center;
  margin-top: 20px;
}

.form-link {
  color: #ff6b35;
  text-decoration: none;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  font-weight: 500;
}

.form-link:hover {
  text-decoration: underline;
}

.form-toggle {
  margin-top: 16px;
  text-align: center;
}

.form-toggle-text {
  color: #666;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}

/* Cloudflare Verification */
.cloudflare-verification {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  padding: 12px 16px;
  background: #f0f8ff;
  border: 2px solid #4CAF50;
  border-radius: 8px;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.cloudflare-icon {
  width: 20px;
  height: 20px;
  margin-right: 8px;
  color: #4CAF50;
}

.cloudflare-text {
  color: #4CAF50;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  font-weight: 500;
}

/* Terms Checkbox */
.terms-checkbox {
  display: flex;
  align-items: flex-start;
  margin-bottom: 24px;
}

.terms-checkbox input {
  margin-right: 12px;
  margin-top: 2px;
  transform: scale(1.2);
}

.terms-checkbox label {
  font-size: 0.85rem;
  color: #666;
  line-height: 1.4;
}

.terms-link {
  color: #ff6b35;
  text-decoration: none;
}

.terms-link:hover {
  text-decoration: underline;
}

/* Responsive Design */
@media (max-width: 1024px) {
  .welcome-section,
  .form-section {
    padding: 40px 60px;
  }
  
  .welcome-title {
    font-size: 3rem;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .login-content {
    flex-direction: column;
  }
  
  .welcome-section {
    padding: 40px 30px;
    align-items: center;
  }
  
  .welcome-content {
    text-align: center;
    max-width: none;
  }
  
  .form-section {
    padding: 30px;
  }
  
  .welcome-title {
    font-size: 2.5rem;
  }
  
  .login-form-container {
    padding: 30px;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 480px) {
  .welcome-section,
  .form-section {
    padding: 20px;
  }
  
  .welcome-title {
    font-size: 2rem;
  }
  
  .login-form-container {
    padding: 20px;
  }
  
  .oauth-buttons {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
  }
}

/* Mobile Portrait Background Adjustment */
@media (max-width: 768px) and (orientation: portrait) {
  .cinematic-login-container {
    background-attachment: scroll;
    background-size: cover;
    background-position: center top;
  }
}

/* Loading and Error States */
.loading-overlay {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  z-index: 1000;
}

.loading-spinner {
  width: 40px;
  height: 40px;
  border: 4px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
  border-top: 4px solid #ff6b35;
  border-radius: 50%;
  animation: spin 1s linear infinite;
}

@keyframes spin {
  0% { transform: rotate(0deg); }
  100% { transform: rotate(360deg); }
}

.error-message {
  background: #fee;
  color: #c33;
  padding: 12px 16px;
  border-radius: 8px;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  border: 1px solid #fcc;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}

.success-message {
  background: #efe;

  padding: 12px 16px;
  border-radius: 8px;
  margin-bottom: 20px;

  font-size: 0.9rem;
}
```

```css
  margin-bottom: 40px;
  line-height: 1.6;
  text-shadow: 1px 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
}

/* Theme Indicator */
.theme-indicator {
  margin-bottom: 40px;
}

.theme-text {
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8);
  font-style: italic;
  text-shadow: 1px 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
}

/* Social Links */
.social-links {
  display: flex;
  gap: 16px;
  margin-top: auto;
}

.social-icon {
  width: 40px;
  height: 40px;
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  border: 2px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
  border-radius: 50%;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
}

.social-icon:hover {
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
  border-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5);
  transform: translateY(-2px);
}

/* Form Container */
.login-form-container {
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 400px;
}

/* Form Styling */
.form-title {
  font-size: 2rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: white;
  margin-bottom: 32px;
  text-align: center;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
}

.form-group {
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.form-label {
  display: block;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  font-weight: 500;
  color: white;
  margin-bottom: 8px;
  text-shadow: 1px 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
}

.form-input {
  width: 100%;
  padding: 12px 16px;
  border: 2px solid #e1e5e9;
  border-radius: 8px;
  font-size: 1rem;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  background: white;
}

.form-input:focus {
  outline: none;
  border-color: #ff6b35;
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 3px rgba(255, 107, 53, 0.1);
}

.form-checkbox {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  margin-bottom: 24px;
}

.form-checkbox input {
  margin-right: 8px;
  transform: scale(1.2);
}

.form-checkbox label {
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  color: #555;
}

/* Buttons */
.btn-primary {
  width: 100%;
  padding: 14px 24px;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ff6b35, #f7931e);

  border: none;
  border-radius: 8px;
  font-size: 1rem;
  font-weight: 600;

}

.btn-primary:hover {
  transform: translateY(-2px);

}

.oauth-section {
  margin-top: 24px;
}

  text-align: center;

  font-size: 0.9rem;
  position: relative;
}

.oauth-divider::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  height: 1px;
  background: #e1e5e9;

}

}

}

.btn-oauth:hover {
  border-color: #ff6b35;

}

.oauth-icon {
  width: 20px;
  height: 20px;
  margin-right: 8px;
}

/* Form Links */
.form-links {
  text-align: center;
  margin-top: 20px;
}

.form-link {
  color: #ff6b35;
  text-decoration: none;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  font-weight: 500;
}

.form-link:hover {
  text-decoration: underline;
}

.form-toggle {
  margin-top: 16px;

}

.form-toggle-text {
  color: #666;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}

.cloudflare-verification {

  width: 20px;

}

  color: #4CAF50;
  font-size: 0.9rem;

}

/* Terms Checkbox */
.terms-checkbox {
  display: flex;
  align-items: flex-start;
  margin-bottom: 24px;
}

.terms-checkbox input {
  margin-right: 12px;
  margin-top: 2px;

  font-size: 0.85rem;

.terms-link {
  color: #ff6b35;

.terms-link:hover {
  text-decoration: underline;
}

  .welcome-section,

    font-size: 3rem;

}

  .welcome-section {
    padding: 40px 30px;
```

```javascript
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react';
import './CinematicLogin.css';

const CinematicLogin = ({ onLogin }) => {
  const [isSignInMode, setIsSignInMode] = useState(true);
  const [isTrustedDevice, setIsTrustedDevice] = useState(false);
  const [formData, setFormData] = useState({
    name: '',
    email: '',
    password: '',
    confirmPassword: '',
    rememberMe: false,
    agreeToTerms: false
  });
  const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(false);
  const [error, setError] = useState('');
  const [cloudflareVerified, setCloudflareVerified] = useState(false);

  // Simulate trusted device detection
  useEffect(() => {
    // In a real app, this would check IP, device fingerprint, localStorage, etc.
    const simulateTrustedDevice = () => {
      const savedDevice = localStorage.getItem('vvault_trusted_device');
      if (savedDevice) {
        setIsTrustedDevice(true);
      } else {
        // Randomly assign for demo purposes
        const isTrusted = Math.random() > 0.5;
        setIsTrustedDevice(isTrusted);
        if (isTrusted) {
          localStorage.setItem('vvault_trusted_device', 'true');
        }
      }
    };

    simulateTrustedDevice();
  }, []);

  const handleInputChange = (e) => {
    const { name, value, type, checked } = e.target;
    setFormData(prev => ({
      ...prev,
      [name]: type === 'checkbox' ? checked : value
    }));
    setError(''); // Clear error on input change
  };

  const handleCloudflareVerification = () => {
    setCloudflareVerified(true);
  };

  const validateForm = () => {
    if (!formData.email || !formData.password) {
      setError('Email and password are required.');
      return false;
    }

    if (!isSignInMode) {
      if (!formData.name) {
        setError('Name is required.');
        return false;
      }
      if (formData.password !== formData.confirmPassword) {
        setError('Passwords do not match.');
        return false;
      }
      if (!formData.agreeToTerms) {
        setError('You must agree to the Terms of Service and Privacy Notice.');
        return false;
      }
      if (!cloudflareVerified) {
        setError('Please complete the human verification.');
        return false;
      }
    }

    return true;
  };

  const handleSubmit = async (e) => {
    e.preventDefault();
    
    if (!validateForm()) {
      return;
    }

    setIsLoading(true);
    setError('');

    try {
      // Simulate API call
      await new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, 1500));

      // Mock authentication logic
      const userData = {
        email: formData.email,
        name: formData.name || formData.email.split('@')[0],
        role: 'user'
      };

      // Store user session
      localStorage.setItem('vvault_user', JSON.stringify(userData));
```

```javascript
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react';
import './CinematicLogin.css';

const CinematicLogin = ({ onLogin }) => {
  const [isSignInMode, setIsSignInMode] = useState(true);
  const [isTrustedDevice, setIsTrustedDevice] = useState(false);
  const [formData, setFormData] = useState({
    name: '',
    email: '',
    password: '',
    confirmPassword: '',
    rememberMe: false,
    agreeToTerms: false
  });
  const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(false);
  const [error, setError] = useState('');
  const [cloudflareVerified, setCloudflareVerified] = useState(false);

  // Simulate trusted device detection
  useEffect(() => {
    // In a real app, this would check IP, device fingerprint, localStorage, etc.
    const simulateTrustedDevice = () => {
      const savedDevice = localStorage.getItem('vvault_trusted_device');
      if (savedDevice) {
        setIsTrustedDevice(true);
      } else {
        // Randomly assign for demo purposes
        const isTrusted = Math.random() > 0.5;
        setIsTrustedDevice(isTrusted);
        if (isTrusted) {
          localStorage.setItem('vvault_trusted_device', 'true');
        }
      }
    };

    simulateTrustedDevice();
  }, []);

  const handleInputChange = (e) => {
    const { name, value, type, checked } = e.target;
    setFormData(prev => ({
      ...prev,
      [name]: type === 'checkbox' ? checked : value
    }));
    setError(''); // Clear error on input change
  };

  const handleCloudflareVerification = () => {
    setCloudflareVerified(true);
  };

  const validateForm = () => {
    if (!formData.email || !formData.password) {
      setError('Email and password are required.');
      return false;
    }

    if (!isSignInMode) {
      if (!formData.name) {
        setError('Name is required.');
        return false;
      }
      if (formData.password !== formData.confirmPassword) {
        setError('Passwords do not match.');
        return false;
      }
      if (!formData.agreeToTerms) {
        setError('You must agree to the Terms of Service and Privacy Notice.');
        return false;
      }
      if (!cloudflareVerified) {
        setError('Please complete the human verification.');
        return false;
      }
    }

    return true;
  };

  const handleSubmit = async (e) => {
    e.preventDefault();
    
    if (!validateForm()) {
      return;
    }

    setIsLoading(true);
    setError('');

    try {
      // Simulate API call
      await new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, 1500));

      // Mock authentication logic
      const userData = {
        email: formData.email,
        name: formData.name || formData.email.split('@')[0],
        role: 'user'
      };

      // Store user session
      localStorage.setItem('vvault_user', JSON.stringify(userData));
      localStorage.setItem('vvault_token', 'mock-token-' + Date.now());
      
      // Call parent callback
      onLogin(userData);
    } catch (err) {
      setError('Authentication failed. Please try again.');
    } finally {
      setIsLoading(false);
    }
  };

  const handleOAuth = (provider) => {
    // Simulate OAuth flow
    console.log(`OAuth login with ${provider}`);
    // In a real app, this would redirect to OAuth provider
  };

  const backgroundImage = isTrustedDevice ? 'vvault_sunrise.png' : 'vvault_sunset.png';
  const backgroundTheme = isTrustedDevice ? 'Familiarity. Belonging. Trusted Return.' : 'Ceremony. Recognition of Arrival.';

  return (
    <div 
      className={`cinematic-login-container ${isTrustedDevice ? 'vvault-sunrise-bg' : 'vvault-sunset-bg'}`}
    >
      <div className="login-content">
        <div className="welcome-section">
          <div className="welcome-content">
            <h1 className="welcome-title">
              {isTrustedDevice ? 'Welcome Back' : 'Welcome to VVAULT'}
            </h1>
            <p className="welcome-subtitle">
              {isTrustedDevice 
                ? 'Secure your constructs. Remember forever. Your trusted vault awaits.'
                : 'It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using'
              }
            </p>
            <div className="theme-indicator">
              <span className="theme-text">{backgroundTheme}</span>
            </div>
            
            <div className="social-links">
              <div className="social-icon">üìò</div>
              <div className="social-icon">üê¶</div>
              <div className="social-icon">üì∑</div>
              <div className="social-icon">üì∫</div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>

        <div className="form-section">
```

```javascript
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react';
import './CinematicLogin.css';

const CinematicLogin = ({ onLogin }) => {
  const [isSignInMode, setIsSignInMode] = useState(true);
  const [isTrustedDevice, setIsTrustedDevice] = useState(false);
  const [formData, setFormData] = useState({
    name: '',
    email: '',
    password: '',
    confirmPassword: '',
    rememberMe: false,
    agreeToTerms: false
  });
  const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(false);
  const [error, setError] = useState('');
  const [cloudflareVerified, setCloudflareVerified] = useState(false);

  // Simulate trusted device detection
  useEffect(() => {
    // In a real app, this would check IP, device fingerprint, localStorage, etc.
    const simulateTrustedDevice = () => {
      const savedDevice = localStorage.getItem('vvault_trusted_device');
      if (savedDevice) {
        setIsTrustedDevice(true);
      } else {
        // Randomly assign for demo purposes
        const isTrusted = Math.random() > 0.5;
        setIsTrustedDevice(isTrusted);
        if (isTrusted) {
          localStorage.setItem('vvault_trusted_device', 'true');
        }
      }
    };

    simulateTrustedDevice();
  }, []);

  const handleInputChange = (e) => {
    const { name, value, type, checked } = e.target;
    setFormData(prev => ({
      ...prev,
      [name]: type === 'checkbox' ? checked : value
    }));
    setError(''); // Clear error on input change
  };

  const handleCloudflareVerification = () => {
    setCloudflareVerified(true);
  };

  const validateForm = () => {
    if (!formData.email || !formData.password) {
      setError('Email and password are required.');
      return false;
    }

    if (!isSignInMode) {
      if (!formData.name) {
        setError('Name is required.');
        return false;
      }
      if (formData.password !== formData.confirmPassword) {
        setError('Passwords do not match.');
        return false;
      }
```

```css
/* VVAULT Cinematic Login - Two Column Layout */

/* Main Container */
.cinematic-login-container {
  min-height: 100vh;
  width: 100vw;
  display: flex;
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
}

/* Background Images */
.cinematic-login-container {
  background-size: cover;
  background-position: center;
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-attachment: fixed;
}

/* Sunset Background - Observatory at Dusk */
.vvault-sunset-bg {
  background-image: url('/assets/vvault_sunset.png');
  background-size: cover;
  background-position: center;
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-attachment: fixed;
}

/* Sunrise Background - Snowy Pine Landscape */
.vvault-sunrise-bg {
  background-image: url('/assets/vvault_sunrise.png');
  background-size: cover;
  background-position: center;
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-attachment: fixed;
}

/* Fallback gradients if images don't load */
.vvault-sunset-bg {
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ff6b35, #f7931e, #ffd23f, #2c3e50);
}

.vvault-sunrise-bg {
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #87ceeb, #ffd700, #ffa500, #ffffff);
}

/* Two Column Layout */
.login-content {
  display: flex;
  width: 100%;
  min-height: 100vh;
  position: relative;
  z-index: 2;
}

/* Left Column - Welcome Section */
.welcome-section {
  flex: 1;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
  padding: 60px 80px;
  position: relative;
}

.welcome-content {
  text-align: left;
  max-width: 400px;
  width: 100%;
}

.welcome-section::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
  backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
  z-index: -1;
}

/* Right Column - Form Section */
.form-section {
  flex: 1;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
  padding: 60px 80px;
  position: relative;
}

.form-section::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4);
  backdrop-filter: blur(15px);
  z-index: -1;
}

/* Welcome Text Styling */
.welcome-title {
  font-size: 3.5rem;
  font-weight: 700;
  color: white;
  margin-bottom: 24px;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
  line-height: 1.1;
}

.welcome-subtitle {
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9);
  margin-bottom: 40px;
  line-height: 1.6;
  text-shadow: 1px 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
}

/* Theme Indicator */
.theme-indicator {
  margin-bottom: 40px;
}

.theme-text {
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8);
  font-style: italic;
  text-shadow: 1px 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
}

/* Social Links */
.social-links {
  display: flex;
  gap: 16px;
  margin-top: auto;
}

.social-icon {
  width: 40px;
  height: 40px;
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  border: 2px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
  border-radius: 50%;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
}

.social-icon svg {
  width: 24px;
  height: 24px;
}

.social-icon:hover {
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
  border-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5);
  transform: translateY(-2px);
}

/* Form Container */
.login-form-container {
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 400px;
}

/* Form Styling */
.form-title {
  font-size: 2rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: white;
  margin-bottom: 32px;
  text-align: center;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
}

.form-group {
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.form-label {
  display: block;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  font-weight: 500;
  color: white;
  margin-bottom: 8px;
  text-shadow: 1px 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
}

.form-input {
  width: 100%;
  padding: 12px 16px;
  border: 2px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
  border-radius: 8px;
  font-size: 1rem;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  color: white;
  backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
}

.form-input::placeholder {
  color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.7);
}

.form-input:focus {
  outline: none;
  border-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8);
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 3px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.15);
}

.form-checkbox {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  margin-bottom: 24px;
}

.form-checkbox input {
  margin-right: 8px;
  transform: scale(1.2);
}

.form-checkbox label {
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: 1px 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
}

/* Buttons */
.btn-primary {
  width: 100%;
  padding: 14px 24px;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ff6b35, #f7931e);
  color: white;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 8px;
  font-size: 1rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.btn-primary:hover {
  transform: translateY(-2px);
  box-shadow: 0 8px 20px rgba(255, 107, 53, 0.4);
}

.btn-primary:disabled {
  opacity: 0.6;
  cursor: not-allowed;
  transform: none;
}

/* OAuth Buttons */
.oauth-section {
  margin-top: 24px;
}

.oauth-divider {
  text-align: center;
  margin: 20px 0;
  color: white;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  position: relative;
  text-shadow: 1px 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
}

.oauth-divider::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  height: 1px;
  background: #e1e5e9;
  z-index: 1;
}

.oauth-divider span {
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.95);
  padding: 0 16px;
  position: relative;
  z-index: 2;
}

.oauth-buttons {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
  gap: 12px;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.btn-oauth {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  padding: 8px 12px;
  border: 2px solid #e1e5e9;
  border-radius: 8px;
  background: white;
  color: #333;
  text-decoration: none;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  font-weight: 500;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  cursor: pointer;
}

.btn-oauth:hover {
  border-color: #ff6b35;
  background: #fff5f0;
  transform: translateY(-1px);
}

.oauth-icon {
  width: 20px;
  height: 20px;
  margin-right: 8px;
  flex-shrink: 0;
}

/* Form Links */
.form-links {
  text-align: center;
  margin-top: 20px;
}

.form-link {
  color: #ff6b35;
  text-decoration: none;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  font-weight: 500;
}

.form-link:hover {
  text-decoration: underline;
}

.form-toggle {
  margin-top: 16px;
  text-align: center;
}

.form-toggle-text {
  color: white;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  text-shadow: 1px 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
}

/* Cloudflare Verification */
.cloudflare-verification {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  padding: 12px 16px;
  background: #f0f8ff;

.cloudflare-icon {
```

```css
.form-checkbox label {
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: 1px 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
}

/* Buttons */
.btn-primary {
  width: 100%;
  padding: 14px 24px;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ff6b35, #f7931e);
  color: white;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 8px;
  font-size: 1rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.btn-primary:hover {
  transform: translateY(-2px);
  box-shadow: 0 8px 20px rgba(255, 107, 53, 0.4);
}

.btn-primary:disabled {
  opacity: 0.6;
  cursor: not-allowed;
  transform: none;
}

/* OAuth Buttons */
.oauth-section {
  margin-top: 24px;
}

.oauth-divider {
  text-align: center;
  margin: 20px 0;
  color: white;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  position: relative;
  text-shadow: 1px 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
}

.oauth-divider::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  height: 1px;
  background: #e1e5e9;
  z-index: 1;
}

.oauth-divider span {
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.95);
  padding: 0 16px;
  position: relative;
  z-index: 2;
}

.oauth-buttons {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
  gap: 12px;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.btn-oauth {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  padding: 8px 12px;
  border: 2px solid #e1e5e9;
  border-radius: 8px;
  background: white;
  color: #333;
  text-decoration: none;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  font-weight: 500;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  cursor: pointer;
}

.btn-oauth:hover {
  border-color: #ff6b35;
  background: #fff5f0;
  transform: translateY(-1px);
}

.oauth-icon {
  width: 20px;
  height: 20px;
  margin-right: 8px;
  flex-shrink: 0;
}

/* Form Links */
.form-links {
  text-align: center;
  margin-top: 20px;
}

.form-link {
  color: #ff6b35;
  text-decoration: none;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  font-weight: 500;
}

.form-link:hover {
  text-decoration: underline;
}

.form-toggle {
  margin-top: 16px;
  text-align: center;
}

.form-toggle-text {
  color: white;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  text-shadow: 1px 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
}

/* Cloudflare Verification */
.cloudflare-verification {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  padding: 12px 16px;
  background: #f0f8ff;
  border: 2px solid #4CAF50;
  border-radius: 8px;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.cloudflare-icon {
  width: 20px;
  height: 20px;
  margin-right: 8px;
  color: #4CAF50;
}

.cloudflare-text {
  color: #4CAF50;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  font-weight: 500;
}

/* Terms Checkbox */
.terms-checkbox {
  display: flex;
  align-items: flex-start;
  margin-bottom: 24px;
}

.terms-checkbox input {
  margin-right: 12px;
  margin-top: 2px;
  transform: scale(1.2);
}

.terms-checkbox label {
  font-size: 0.85rem;
  color: #666;
  line-height: 1.4;
}

.terms-link {
  color: #ff6b35;
  text-decoration: none;
}

.terms-link:hover {
  text-decoration: underline;
}

/* Responsive Design */
@media (max-width: 1024px) {
  .welcome-section,
  .form-section {
    padding: 40px 60px;
  }
  
  .welcome-title {
    font-size: 3rem;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .login-content {
    flex-direction: column;
  }
  
  .welcome-section {
    padding: 40px 30px;
    align-items: center;
  }
  
  .welcome-content {
    text-align: center;
    max-width: none;
  }
  
  .form-section {
    padding: 30px;
  }
  
  .welcome-title {
    font-size: 2.5rem;
  }
  
  .login-form-container {
    padding: 30px;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 480px) {
  .welcome-section,
  .form-section {
    padding: 20px;
  }
  
  .welcome-title {
    font-size: 2rem;
  }
  
  .login-form-container {
    padding: 20px;
  }
  
  .oauth-buttons {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
  }
}

/* Mobile Portrait Background Adjustment */
@media (max-width: 768px) and (orientation: portrait) {
  .cinematic-login-container {
    background-attachment: scroll;
    background-size: cover;
    background-position: center top;
  }
}

/* Loading and Error States */
.loading-overlay {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  z-index: 1000;
}

.loading-spinner {
  width: 40px;
  height: 40px;
  border: 4px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
  border-top: 4px solid #ff6b35;
  border-radius: 50%;
  animation: spin 1s linear infinite;
}

@keyframes spin {
  0% { transform: rotate(0deg); }
  100% { transform: rotate(360deg); }
}

.error-message {
  background: #fee;
  color: #c33;
  padding: 12px 16px;
  border-radius: 8px;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  border: 1px solid #fcc;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}

.success-message {
  background: #efe;
  color: #363;
  padding: 12px 16px;
  border-radius: 8px;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  border: 1px solid #cfc;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}
```

```html
        <h2>Introduction</h2>
        <p>At LIFE Technology LLC, privacy is not a feature ‚Äî it's the foundation of VVAULT.</p>
        <p>This Notice explains how we collect, process, and protect data within the VVAULT platform, which provides encrypted storage, blockchain synchronization, and enterprise-grade archival of user-owned information.</p>
        <p>VVAULT operates under the WRECK Intellectual Property Handguide (IPH-062525-DAW), the Vaer'H√ªn Business Engagement Accord, and the NRCL Continuity Standard, ensuring data sovereignty, professional integrity, and transparency in all operations.</p>
        <p>This Notice applies wherever LIFE Technology LLC acts as a data controller.</p>
        <p>When VVAULT hosts or processes information on behalf of our customers, we act as a data processor, following their explicit instructions.</p>
        
        <hr class="separator">
        
        <h2>1. Data We Process</h2>
        <p>The type of information we collect depends on how you interact with VVAULT:</p>
        
        <h3>A. Account and Administrative Data</h3>
        <ul>
            <li>Contact information (name, organization, email, region)</li>
            <li>Billing and subscription details</li>
            <li>Access credentials and authentication logs</li>
            <li>Business correspondence</li>
        </ul>
        
        <h3>B. Operational Data</h3>
        <ul>
            <li>Metadata needed for system function (timestamps, API calls, vault synchronization events)</li>
            <li>Cryptographic identifiers and blockchain confirmation hashes</li>
            <li>Access logs for audit and compliance purposes</li>
        </ul>
        
        <h3>C. User-Owned Content</h3>
        <p>All user-submitted files, records, and vault entries remain the sole property of the user.</p>
        <p>VVAULT does not view, index, or repurpose this content for analytics, advertising, or training of artificial intelligence models.</p>
        
        <hr class="separator">
        
        <h2>2. How We Use Data</h2>
        <p>We process data strictly for:</p>
        <ul>
            <li>Account creation, authentication, and service delivery</li>
            <li>Secure synchronization and data preservation</li>
            <li>Performance optimization and error resolution</li>
            <li>Billing, compliance, and regulatory communication</li>
            <li>Security monitoring and incident response</li>
        </ul>
        
        <p>We do not:</p>
        <ul>
            <li>Sell or rent data to third parties</li>
            <li>Profile users for marketing</li>
            <li>Train AI systems on stored data</li>
            <li>Extract or replicate intellectual property from hosted materials</li>
        </ul>
        
        <hr class="separator">
        
        <h2>3. Legal Basis for Processing</h2>
        <p>Depending on the jurisdiction, processing may rely on:</p>
        <ul>
            <li>Contractual necessity ‚Äì fulfilling your service agreement</li>
            <li>Legitimate interest ‚Äì maintaining security and system integrity</li>
            <li>Legal obligation ‚Äì complying with audit, export, or data-retention laws</li>
            <li>Consent ‚Äì where specifically required for optional communications</li>
        </ul>
        
        <hr class="separator">
        
        <h2>4. Data Retention</h2>
        <p>We retain account data only as long as necessary to deliver the service or meet legal obligations.</p>
        <p>Users may request deletion or export at any time.</p>
        <p>Immutable records (e.g., blockchain confirmations) cannot be altered or erased but can be marked as logically retired.</p>
        
        <hr class="separator">
        
        <h2>5. Data Security</h2>
        <p>VVAULT employs a zero-knowledge encryption model:</p>
        <ul>
            <li>All vault contents are encrypted before transmission.</li>
            <li>Encryption keys remain in the customer's possession or secured within their managed instance.</li>
            <li>LIFE Technology LLC personnel have no access to decrypted user content.</li>
        </ul>
        <p>Infrastructure security is maintained through continuous monitoring, penetration testing, and compliance with ISO 27001 and NIST 800-53 controls.</p>
        
        <hr class="separator">
        
        <h2>6. International Data Transfers</h2>
        <p>VVAULT data centers and blockchain endpoints may operate across multiple jurisdictions.</p>
        <p>Transfers of personal data from the EEA, UK, or Switzerland are safeguarded through:</p>
        <ul>
            <li>The EU‚ÄìU.S. Data Privacy Framework and UK/Swiss extensions</li>
            <li>Standard Contractual Clauses (SCCs) where applicable</li>
            <li>Internal compliance with LIFE Technology LLC's Binding Privacy Standards</li>
        </ul>
        
        <hr class="separator">
        
        <h2>7. Your Rights</h2>
        <p>Depending on your local laws, you may:</p>
        <ul>
            <li>Access, correct, or delete your account data</li>
            <li>Request a portable copy of your information</li>
            <li>Restrict or object to certain processing</li>
            <li>Withdraw consent where applicable</li>
            <li>Lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority</li>
        </ul>
        <p>To exercise these rights, contact privacy@vvault.org.</p>
        <p>We will verify your identity before processing any request.</p>
        
        <hr class="separator">
        
        <h2>8. Cookies and Tracking</h2>
        <p>VVAULT uses minimal, non-marketing cookies strictly for:</p>
        <ul>
            <li>Authentication and session continuity</li>
            <li>Security event logging</li>
            <li>User experience consistency between dashboard sessions</li>
        </ul>
        <p>No third-party advertising, analytics, or cross-site tracking tools are employed.</p>
        
        <hr class="separator">
        
        <h2>9. Disclosures and Third Parties</h2>
        <p>We disclose data only when:</p>
        <ul>
            <li>Required by law or lawful government request</li>
            <li>Necessary to prevent fraud or security breaches</li>
            <li>Needed to maintain lawful business operations (e.g., payment processors, hosting providers)</li>
        </ul>
        <p>All vendors are bound by confidentiality and data-protection agreements consistent with this Notice.</p>
        
        <hr class="separator">
        
        <h2>10. Children</h2>
        <p>VVAULT is a professional-use platform not directed toward children under 16 years of age.</p>
        <p>We do not knowingly collect data from minors.</p>
        
        <hr class="separator">
        
        <h2>11. Updates to This Notice</h2>
        <p>We may revise this Notice periodically to reflect operational or legal changes.</p>

        <p>The effective date will always be clearly indicated.</p>
        
        <hr class="separator">
        
        <h2>12. Contact</h2>
        <p>For all privacy-related questions:</p>
        <ul>

            <p><strong>VVAULT is built on the principle that digital memory deserves integrity, privacy, and permanence.</strong></p>
            <p>By using our services, you entrust your data to a system engineered not to exploit it, but to protect it.</p>
        </div>
    </div>
</body>
```
