import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react';
import './CinematicLogin.css';

const CinematicLogin = ({ onLogin }) => {
  const [isSignInMode, setIsSignInMode] = useState(true);
  const [isTrustedDevice, setIsTrustedDevice] = useState(false);
  const [formData, setFormData] = useState({
    name: '',
    email: '',
    password: '',
    confirmPassword: '',
    rememberMe: false,
    agreeToTerms: false
  });
  const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(false);
  const [error, setError] = useState('');
  const [cloudflareVerified, setCloudflareVerified] = useState(false);

  // Turnstile state
  const [turnstileToken, setTurnstileToken] = useState('');
  const [turnstileWidgetId, setTurnstileWidgetId] = useState('');
  const [turnstileError, setTurnstileError] = useState('');
  const turnstileSiteKey = process.env.REACT_APP_TURNSTILE_SITE_KEY;

  // Initialize Cloudflare Turnstile
  useEffect(() => {
    const loadTurnstile = () => {
      if (window.turnstile) {
        // Turnstile is already loaded
        return;
      }

      if (!turnstileSiteKey) {
        console.error('Turnstile site key is not configured. Set REACT_APP_TURNSTILE_SITE_KEY in your environment.')
        setTurnstileError('Human verification is temporarily unavailable. Please contact support.')
        return;
      }
      
      const script = document.createElement('script');
      script.src = 'https://challenges.cloudflare.com/turnstile/v0/api.js';
      script.async = true;
      script.defer = true;
      document.head.appendChild(script);
    };

    loadTurnstile();
  }, [turnstileSiteKey]);

  // Initialize Turnstile widget when in signup mode
  useEffect(() => {
    if (!isSignInMode && window.turnstile && !turnstileWidgetId) {
      if (!turnstileSiteKey) {
        return;
      }
      const widgetId = window.turnstile.render('#turnstile-widget', {
        sitekey: turnstileSiteKey,
        callback: (token) => {
          setTurnstileToken(token);
          setTurnstileError('');
        },
        'error-callback': (error) => {
          setTurnstileError('Human verification failed. Please try again.');
          setTurnstileToken('');
        },
        'expired-callback': () => {
          setTurnstileError('Verification expired. Please verify again.');
          setTurnstileToken('');
        },
        theme: 'dark',
        size: 'compact'
      });
      setTurnstileWidgetId(widgetId);
    }
  }, [isSignInMode, turnstileWidgetId, turnstileSiteKey]);

  // Cleanup Turnstile widget when switching modes
  useEffect(() => {
    if (isSignInMode && turnstileWidgetId && window.turnstile) {
      window.turnstile.remove(turnstileWidgetId);
      setTurnstileWidgetId('');
      setTurnstileToken('');
      setTurnstileError('');
    }
  }, [isSignInMode, turnstileWidgetId]);
  useEffect(() => {

        if (isTrusted) {
          localStorage.setItem('vvault_trusted_device', 'true');
        }
      }
    };

    simulateTrustedDevice();
  }, []);

  const handleInputChange = (e) => {
    const { name, value, type, checked } = e.target;
    setFormData(prev => ({
      ...prev,
      [name]: type === 'checkbox' ? checked : value
    }));
    setError(''); // Clear error on input change
  };

  const handleCloudflareVerification = () => {
    setCloudflareVerified(true);
  };

  const validateForm = () => {
    if (!formData.email || !formData.password) {
      setError('Email and password are required.');
      return false;
    }

    if (!isSignInMode) {
      if (!formData.name) {
        setError('Name is required.');
        return false;
      }
      if (formData.password !== formData.confirmPassword) {
        setError('Passwords do not match.');
        return false;
      }
      if (!formData.agreeToTerms) {
        setError('You must agree to the Terms of Service and Privacy Notice.');
        return false;
      }
      if (!cloudflareVerified) {
        setError('Please complete the human verification.');
        return false;
      }
    }

    return true;
  };

  const handleSubmit = async (e) => {
    e.preventDefault();
    
    if (!validateForm()) {
      return;
    }

    // Validate Turnstile for signup

      setError('Please complete human verification.');
      return;

        })

        },
        body: JSON.stringify(requestData)

      if (!response.ok) {

      localStorage.setItem('vvault_user', JSON.stringify(result.user));

Now let me update the webpack configuration to handle environment variables like Chatty does. Let me check VVAULT's webpack config:


I need to add environment variable support to webpack. Let me update the webpack config:


```javascript
const path = require('path');
const HtmlWebpackPlugin = require('html-webpack-plugin');
const webpack = require('webpack');

module.exports = {
  entry: './src/index.js',
  output: {
    path: path.resolve(__dirname, 'dist'),
    filename: 'bundle.[contenthash].js',
    clean: true,
    publicPath: '/'
  },
  module: {
    rules: [
      {
        test: /\.(js|jsx)$/,
        exclude: /node_modules/,
        use: {
          loader: 'babel-loader',
          options: {
            presets: ['@babel/preset-env', '@babel/preset-react']
          }
        }
      },
      {
        test: /\.css$/i,
        use: ['style-loader', 'css-loader']
      }
    ]
  },
  resolve: {
    extensions: ['.js', '.jsx']
  },
  plugins: [
    new HtmlWebpackPlugin({
      template: './public/index.html',
      title: 'VVAULT - AI Construct Memory Vault'
    }),
    new webpack.DefinePlugin({
      'process.env.REACT_APP_TURNSTILE_SITE_KEY': JSON.stringify(process.env.REACT_APP_TURNSTILE_SITE_KEY)
    })
  ],
  devServer: {
    static: [
      {
        directory: path.join(__dirname, 'dist'),
      },
      {
        directory: path.join(__dirname, 'assets'),
        publicPath: '/assets'
      }
    ],
    compress: true,
    port: 7784,
    host: 'localhost',
    hot: true,
    open: true,
    historyApiFallback: true,
    proxy: {
      '/api': {
        target: 'http://localhost:8000',
        changeOrigin: true,
        secure: false
      }
    },
    client: {
      overlay: {
        errors: true,
        warnings: false
      }
    }
  },
  devtool: 'eval-source-map'
};
```

```markdown
# VVAULT Turnstile Configuration Guide (Chatty Clone)

## Setup Instructions

1. **Create a `.env` file** in the VVAULT root directory with your Turnstile keys:

```bash
# Cloudflare Turnstile Configuration
TURNSTILE_SITE_KEY=your-turnstile-site-key-here
TURNSTILE_SECRET_KEY=your-turnstile-secret-key-here
REACT_APP_TURNSTILE_SITE_KEY=your-turnstile-site-key-here
```

2. **Restart the development server** after adding environment variables:
```bash
npm run dev:full
```

## Getting Turnstile Keys

1. Go to [Cloudflare Dashboard](https://dash.cloudflare.com/profile/api-tokens)
2. Navigate to "Turnstile" section
3. Create a new site
4. Add your domains: `localhost:7784` and `localhost:8000`
5. Copy the Site Key and Secret Key

## Implementation Status

‚úÖ **Frontend**: Exact Chatty Turnstile implementation cloned
‚úÖ **Backend**: Real Turnstile verification (no test fallback)
‚úÖ **API**: Registration endpoint with real human verification
‚úÖ **Error Handling**: Turnstile-specific error messages
‚úÖ **Environment Variables**: Webpack DefinePlugin configured
‚úÖ **Production Ready**: Requires real keys to function

## Features (Cloned from Chatty)

- **Real Turnstile Widget**: Actual human verification required
- **Dark Theme**: Matches VVAULT's cinematic design
- **Compact Size**: Fits nicely in the form
- **Error Handling**: Shows specific error messages
- **Auto-cleanup**: Widget removed when switching modes
- **Backend Verification**: Server-side token validation with Cloudflare
- **Environment Variables**: Proper webpack configuration

## Code Structure (Chatty Clone)

### Frontend (CinematicLogin.js)
- **State Management**: `turnstileToken`, `turnstileWidgetId`, `turnstileError`
- **Environment Variable**: `process.env.REACT_APP_TURNSTILE_SITE_KEY`
- **Widget Lifecycle**: Load ‚Üí Render ‚Üí Cleanup
- **Error Handling**: Callback, error-callback, expired-callback

### Backend (vvault_web_server.py)
- **Token Verification**: Real Cloudflare API calls
- **Environment Variable**: `TURNSTILE_SECRET_KEY`
- **Error Logging**: Failed attempts logged
- **Security**: No test mode fallback

### Webpack Configuration
- **DefinePlugin**: Injects environment variables
- **Process.env**: Available in browser bundle

## Security

- **No Test Mode**: Real verification required for all registrations
- **Environment Variables**: Keys stored securely in .env file
- **Server Validation**: Backend verifies tokens with Cloudflare API
- **Error Logging**: Failed attempts logged for monitoring

## Usage

1. User switches to "Create Account" mode
2. Turnstile widget appears automatically
3. User completes real human verification
4. Form submission includes Turnstile token
5. Backend verifies token with Cloudflare
6. Registration proceeds only if verification passes

## Troubleshooting

- **Widget not appearing**: Check REACT_APP_TURNSTILE_SITE_KEY is set
- **Verification failing**: Check TURNSTILE_SECRET_KEY in .env file
- **Backend errors**: Verify TURNSTILE_SECRET_KEY is set
- **Environment variables**: Restart dev server after .env changes
- **Network issues**: Check Cloudflare API connectivity
```

        // Turnstile is already loaded

        console.error('Turnstile site key is not configured. Set REACT_APP_TURNSTILE_SITE_KEY in your environment.')
        setTurnstileError('Human verification is temporarily unavailable. Please contact support.')
        return;
      }
      
      const script = document.createElement('script');
      script.src = 'https://challenges.cloudflare.com/turnstile/v0/api.js';
      script.async = true;
      script.defer = true;
      document.head.appendChild(script);
    };

    loadTurnstile();

        sitekey: turnstileSiteKey,
        callback: (token) => {
          setTurnstileToken(token);
          setTurnstileError('');
        },
        'error-callback': (error) => {
          setTurnstileError('Human verification failed. Please try again.');
          setTurnstileToken('');
        },
        'expired-callback': () => {

import './CinematicLogin.css';

  const [isTrustedDevice, setIsTrustedDevice] = useState(false);

    name: '',
    email: '',
    password: '',
    confirmPassword: '',
    rememberMe: false,
    agreeToTerms: false
  });

  const [cloudflareVerified, setCloudflareVerified] = useState(false);

  const [turnstileWidgetId, setTurnstileWidgetId] = useState('');
  const [turnstileError, setTurnstileError] = useState('');
  const turnstileSiteKey = '0x4AAAAAAB9IaDdnFsA9yISn'; // Using same key as Chatty

  useEffect(() => {

      if (window.turnstile) {
        // Turnstile is already loaded
        return;

        setTurnstileError('Human verification is temporarily unavailable. Please contact support.')

      }
      
      const script = document.createElement('script');
      script.src = 'https://challenges.cloudflare.com/turnstile/v0/api.js';
      script.async = true;
      script.defer = true;
      document.head.appendChild(script);
    };

    loadTurnstile();
  }, [turnstileSiteKey]);

  // Initialize Turnstile widget when in signup mode
  useEffect(() => {
    if (!isSignInMode && window.turnstile && !turnstileWidgetId) {
      if (!turnstileSiteKey) {
        return;
      }
      const widgetId = window.turnstile.render('#turnstile-widget', {
        sitekey: turnstileSiteKey,
        callback: (token) => {
          setTurnstileToken(token);
          setTurnstileError('');
        },
        'error-callback': (error) => {
          setTurnstileError('Human verification failed. Please try again.');
          setTurnstileToken('');
        },
        'expired-callback': () => {
          setTurnstileError('Verification expired. Please verify again.');
          setTurnstileToken('');
        },
        theme: 'dark',
        size: 'compact'
      });
      setTurnstileWidgetId(widgetId);
    }
  }, [isSignInMode, turnstileWidgetId, turnstileSiteKey]);

  // Cleanup Turnstile widget when switching modes
  useEffect(() => {
    if (isSignInMode && turnstileWidgetId && window.turnstile) {
      window.turnstile.remove(turnstileWidgetId);
      setTurnstileWidgetId('');
      setTurnstileToken('');
      setTurnstileError('');
    }
  }, [isSignInMode, turnstileWidgetId]);
  useEffect(() => {
    // In a real app, this would check IP, device fingerprint, localStorage, etc.
    const simulateTrustedDevice = () => {
      const savedDevice = localStorage.getItem('vvault_trusted_device');
      if (savedDevice) {
        setIsTrustedDevice(true);
      } else {
        // Randomly assign for demo purposes
        const isTrusted = Math.random() > 0.5;
        setIsTrustedDevice(isTrusted);
        if (isTrusted) {
          localStorage.setItem('vvault_trusted_device', 'true');
        }
      }
    };

    simulateTrustedDevice();
  }, []);

  const handleInputChange = (e) => {
    const { name, value, type, checked } = e.target;
    setFormData(prev => ({
      ...prev,
      [name]: type === 'checkbox' ? checked : value
    }));
    setError(''); // Clear error on input change
  };

  const handleCloudflareVerification = () => {
    setCloudflareVerified(true);
  };

  const validateForm = () => {
    if (!formData.email || !formData.password) {
      setError('Email and password are required.');
      return false;
    }

    if (!isSignInMode) {
      if (!formData.name) {
        setError('Name is required.');
        return false;
      }
      if (formData.password !== formData.confirmPassword) {
        setError('Passwords do not match.');
        return false;
      }
      if (!formData.agreeToTerms) {
        setError('You must agree to the Terms of Service and Privacy Notice.');
        return false;
      }
      if (!cloudflareVerified) {
        setError('Please complete the human verification.');
        return false;
      }
    }

    return true;
  };

  const handleSubmit = async (e) => {
    e.preventDefault();
    
    if (!validateForm()) {
      return;
    }

    // Validate Turnstile for signup
    if (!isSignInMode && !turnstileToken) {
      setError('Please complete human verification.');
      return;
    }

    setIsLoading(true);
    setError('');

    try {
      // Prepare request data
      const requestData = {
        email: formData.email,
        password: formData.password,
        ...(isSignInMode ? {} : {
          name: formData.name,
          confirmPassword: formData.confirmPassword,
          turnstileToken: turnstileToken
        })
      };

      // Make API call to backend
      const endpoint = isSignInMode ? '/api/auth/login' : '/api/auth/register';
      const response = await fetch(`http://localhost:8000${endpoint}`, {
        method: 'POST',
        headers: {
          'Content-Type': 'application/json',
        },
        body: JSON.stringify(requestData)
      });

      const result = await response.json();

      if (!response.ok) {
        throw new Error(result.error || 'Authentication failed');
      }

      // Store user session
      localStorage.setItem('vvault_user', JSON.stringify(result.user));
      localStorage.setItem('vvault_token', result.token);
      
      // Call parent callback
      onLogin(result.user);
    } catch (err) {
      setError(err.message || 'Authentication failed. Please try again.');
    } finally {
      setIsLoading(false);
    }
  };

  const handleOAuth = (provider) => {

  };

  const backgroundTheme = isTrustedDevice ? 'Familiarity. Belonging. Trusted Return.' : 'Ceremony. Recognition of Arrival.';

Now let me also check if there are any differences in the widget rendering. Let me look at the exact styling differences between Chatty and VVAULT:


I notice that Chatty uses `space-y-2` class and `text-xs text-red-600 text-center` for error styling. Let me update VVAULT's CSS to match this exactly:

  border: 2px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5) !important;
  border-radius: 8px !important;
  font-size: 1rem !important;
  transition: all 0.3s ease !important;
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.15) !important;
  color: white !important;
  backdrop-filter: blur(10px) !important;
}

  color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8) !important;
}

  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2) !important;
}

}

}

.form-checkbox label {
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: 1px 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
}

/* Buttons */
.btn-primary {
  width: auto;
  padding: 10px 20px;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ff6b35, #f7931e);
  color: white;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 6px;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  align-self: flex-start;
}

.btn-primary:hover {
  transform: translateY(-2px);
  box-shadow: 0 8px 20px rgba(255, 107, 53, 0.4);
}

.password-link {
  margin-top: 6px;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  text-align: left;
}

.password-link .form-link {
  color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8);
  text-decoration: none;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  transition: color 0.3s ease;
}

.password-link .form-link:hover {
  color: white;
  text-decoration: underline;
}

.btn-primary:disabled {
  opacity: 0.6;
  cursor: not-allowed;
  transform: none;
}

/* OAuth Buttons */
.oauth-section {
  margin-top: 24px;
}

.oauth-divider {
  text-align: center;
  margin: 20px 0;
  color: white;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  position: relative;
  text-shadow: 1px 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
}

.oauth-divider::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  height: 1px;
  background: #e1e5e9;
  z-index: 1;
}

.oauth-divider span {
  padding: 0 16px;
  position: relative;
  z-index: 2;
}

.oauth-buttons {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
  gap: 12px;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.btn-oauth {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  padding: 8px 12px;
  border: 2px solid #e1e5e9;
  border-radius: 8px;
  background: white;
  color: #333;
  text-decoration: none;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  font-weight: 500;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  cursor: pointer;
}

.btn-oauth:hover {
  border-color: #ff6b35;
  background: #fff5f0;
  transform: translateY(-1px);
}

.oauth-icon {
  width: 20px;
  height: 20px;
  margin-right: 8px;
  flex-shrink: 0;
}

/* Form Links */
.form-links {
  text-align: center;
  margin-top: 20px;
}

.form-link {
  color: #ff6b35;
  text-decoration: none;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  font-weight: 500;
  background: none;
  border: none;
  padding: 0;
  cursor: pointer;
}

.form-link:hover {
  text-decoration: underline;
}

.form-toggle {
  margin-top: 16px;
  text-align: center;
}

.form-toggle-text {
  color: white;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  text-shadow: 1px 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
}

/* Turnstile Verification */
.turnstile-verification {
  margin: 20px 0;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 8px; /* space-y-2 equivalent */
}

.turnstile-error {
  color: #dc2626; /* text-red-600 */
  font-size: 0.75rem; /* text-xs */
  text-align: center;
}

#turnstile-widget {
  margin: 0 auto;
}

.flex {
  display: flex;
}

.justify-center {
  justify-content: center;
}

/* Terms Checkbox */
.terms-checkbox {
  display: flex;
  align-items: flex-start;
  margin-bottom: 24px;
}

.terms-checkbox input {
  margin-right: 12px;
  margin-top: 2px;
  transform: scale(1.2);
}

.terms-checkbox label {
  font-size: 0.85rem;
  color: #666;
  line-height: 1.4;
}

.terms-link {
  color: #ff6b35;
  text-decoration: none;
}

.terms-link:hover {
  text-decoration: underline;
}

/* Responsive Design */
@media (max-width: 1024px) {
  .welcome-section,
  .form-section {
    padding: 40px 60px;
  }
  
  .welcome-title {
    font-size: 3rem;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .login-content {
    flex-direction: column;
  }
  
  .welcome-section {
    padding: 40px 30px;
    align-items: center;
  }
  
  .welcome-content {
    text-align: center;
    max-width: none;
  }
  
  .form-section {
    padding: 30px;
  }
  
  .welcome-title {
    font-size: 2.5rem;
  }
  
  .login-form-container {
    padding: 30px;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 480px) {
  .welcome-section,
  .form-section {
    padding: 20px;
  }
  
  .welcome-title {
    font-size: 2rem;
  }
  
  .login-form-container {
    padding: 20px;
  }
  
  .oauth-buttons {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
  }
}

/* Mobile Portrait Background Adjustment */
@media (max-width: 768px) and (orientation: portrait) {
  .cinematic-login-container {
    background-attachment: scroll;
    background-size: cover;
    background-position: center top;
  }
}

/* Loading and Error States */
.loading-overlay {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  z-index: 1000;
}

.loading-spinner {
  width: 40px;
  height: 40px;
  border: 4px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
  border-top: 4px solid #ff6b35;
  border-radius: 50%;
  animation: spin 1s linear infinite;
}

@keyframes spin {
  0% { transform: rotate(0deg); }
  100% { transform: rotate(360deg); }
}

.error-message {
  background: #fee;
  color: #c33;
  padding: 12px 16px;
  border-radius: 8px;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  border: 1px solid #fcc;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}

.success-message {
  background: #efe;
  color: #363;
  padding: 12px 16px;
  border-radius: 8px;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  border: 1px solid #cfc;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}

Now let me also check if there's a difference in the widget configuration. Let me look at Chatty's exact Turnstile configuration:


I see the difference! Chatty uses `theme: 'auto'` and `size: 'normal'`, while VVAULT uses `theme: 'dark'` and `size: 'compact'`. Let me update VVAULT to match Chatty's configuration:


```javascript
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react';
import './CinematicLogin.css';

const CinematicLogin = ({ onLogin }) => {
  const [isSignInMode, setIsSignInMode] = useState(true);
  const [isTrustedDevice, setIsTrustedDevice] = useState(false);
  const [formData, setFormData] = useState({
    name: '',
    email: '',
    password: '',
    confirmPassword: '',
    rememberMe: false,
    agreeToTerms: false
  });
  const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(false);
  const [error, setError] = useState('');
  const [cloudflareVerified, setCloudflareVerified] = useState(false);

  // Turnstile state
  const [turnstileToken, setTurnstileToken] = useState('');
  const [turnstileWidgetId, setTurnstileWidgetId] = useState('');
  const [turnstileError, setTurnstileError] = useState('');
  const turnstileSiteKey = '0x4AAAAAAB9IaDdnFsA9yISn'; // Using same key as Chatty

  // Initialize Cloudflare Turnstile
  useEffect(() => {
    const loadTurnstile = () => {
      if (window.turnstile) {
        // Turnstile is already loaded
        return;
      }

      if (!turnstileSiteKey) {
        console.error('Turnstile site key is not configured.')
        setTurnstileError('Human verification is temporarily unavailable. Please contact support.')
        return;
      }
      
      const script = document.createElement('script');
      script.src = 'https://challenges.cloudflare.com/turnstile/v0/api.js';
      script.async = true;
      script.defer = true;
      document.head.appendChild(script);
    };

    loadTurnstile();
  }, [turnstileSiteKey]);

  // Initialize Turnstile widget when in signup mode
  useEffect(() => {
    if (!isSignInMode && window.turnstile && !turnstileWidgetId) {
      if (!turnstileSiteKey) {
        return;
      }
      const widgetId = window.turnstile.render('#turnstile-widget', {
        sitekey: turnstileSiteKey,
        callback: (token) => {
          setTurnstileToken(token);
          setTurnstileError('');
        },
        'error-callback': (error) => {
          setTurnstileError('Human verification failed. Please try again.');
          setTurnstileToken('');
        },
        'expired-callback': () => {
          setTurnstileError('Verification expired. Please verify again.');
          setTurnstileToken('');
        },
        theme: 'auto',
        size: 'normal'
      });
      setTurnstileWidgetId(widgetId);
    }
  }, [isSignInMode, turnstileWidgetId, turnstileSiteKey]);

  // Cleanup Turnstile widget when switching modes
  useEffect(() => {
    if (isSignInMode && turnstileWidgetId && window.turnstile) {
      window.turnstile.remove(turnstileWidgetId);
      setTurnstileWidgetId('');
      setTurnstileToken('');
      setTurnstileError('');
    }
  }, [isSignInMode, turnstileWidgetId]);
  useEffect(() => {
    // In a real app, this would check IP, device fingerprint, localStorage, etc.
    const simulateTrustedDevice = () => {
      const savedDevice = localStorage.getItem('vvault_trusted_device');
      if (savedDevice) {
        setIsTrustedDevice(true);
      } else {
        // Randomly assign for demo purposes
        const isTrusted = Math.random() > 0.5;
        setIsTrustedDevice(isTrusted);
        if (isTrusted) {
          localStorage.setItem('vvault_trusted_device', 'true');
        }
      }
    };

    simulateTrustedDevice();
  }, []);

  const handleInputChange = (e) => {
    const { name, value, type, checked } = e.target;
    setFormData(prev => ({
      ...prev,
      [name]: type === 'checkbox' ? checked : value
    }));
    setError(''); // Clear error on input change
  };

  const handleCloudflareVerification = () => {
    setCloudflareVerified(true);
  };

  const validateForm = () => {
    if (!formData.email || !formData.password) {
      setError('Email and password are required.');
      return false;
    }

    if (!isSignInMode) {
      if (!formData.name) {
        setError('Name is required.');
        return false;
      }
      if (formData.password !== formData.confirmPassword) {
        setError('Passwords do not match.');
        return false;
      }
      if (!formData.agreeToTerms) {
        setError('You must agree to the Terms of Service and Privacy Notice.');
        return false;
      }
      if (!cloudflareVerified) {
        setError('Please complete the human verification.');
        return false;
      }
    }

    return true;
  };

  const handleSubmit = async (e) => {
    e.preventDefault();
    
    if (!validateForm()) {
      return;
    }

    // Validate Turnstile for signup
    if (!isSignInMode && !turnstileToken) {
      setError('Please complete human verification.');
      return;
    }

    setIsLoading(true);
    setError('');

    try {
      // Prepare request data
      const requestData = {
        email: formData.email,
        password: formData.password,
        ...(isSignInMode ? {} : {
          name: formData.name,
          confirmPassword: formData.confirmPassword,
          turnstileToken: turnstileToken
        })
      };

      // Make API call to backend
      const endpoint = isSignInMode ? '/api/auth/login' : '/api/auth/register';
      const response = await fetch(`http://localhost:8000${endpoint}`, {
        method: 'POST',
        headers: {
          'Content-Type': 'application/json',
        },
        body: JSON.stringify(requestData)
      });

      const result = await response.json();

      if (!response.ok) {
        throw new Error(result.error || 'Authentication failed');
      }

      // Store user session
      localStorage.setItem('vvault_user', JSON.stringify(result.user));
      localStorage.setItem('vvault_token', result.token);
      
      // Call parent callback
      onLogin(result.user);
    } catch (err) {
      setError(err.message || 'Authentication failed. Please try again.');
    } finally {
      setIsLoading(false);
    }
  };

  const handleOAuth = (provider) => {
    // Simulate OAuth flow
    console.log(`OAuth login with ${provider}`);
    // In a real app, this would redirect to OAuth provider
  };

  const backgroundImage = isTrustedDevice ? 'vvault_sunrise.png' : 'vvault_sunset.png';
  const backgroundTheme = isTrustedDevice ? 'Familiarity. Belonging. Trusted Return.' : 'Ceremony. Recognition of Arrival.';

  return (
    <div 
      className={`cinematic-login-container ${isTrustedDevice ? 'vvault-sunrise-bg' : 'vvault-sunset-bg'}`}
    >
      <div className="login-content">

          <div className="welcome-content">
            <h1 className="welcome-title">
              {isTrustedDevice ? (
                <>
                  Welcome<br />
                  <span className="welcome-back">Back</span>
                </>
              ) : (
                'Welcome to VVAULT'
              )}
            </h1>
            <p className="welcome-subtitle">
              {isTrustedDevice 
                ? 'VVAULT still holds what you trusted with it.'
                : 'It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using'
              }
            </p>
            <div className="theme-indicator">
              <span className="theme-text">Click 'Remember Me' to skip login on this device next time.</span>
            </div>
            
            <div className="social-links">
              <div className="social-icon">
                <svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" width="24" height="24">
                  <path fill="white" d="M24 12.073c0-6.627-5.373-12-12-12s-12 5.373-12 12c0 5.99 4.388 10.954 10.125 11.854v-8.385H7.078v-3.47h3.047V9.43c0-3.007 1.792-4.669 4.533-4.669 1.312 0 2.686.235 2.686.235v2.953H15.83c-1.491 0-1.956.925-1.956 1.874v2.25h3.328l-.532 3.47h-2.796v8.385C19.612 23.027 24 18.062 24 12.073z"/>
                </svg>
              </div>
              <div className="social-icon">
                <svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" width="24" height="24">
                  <path fill="white" d="M23.953 4.57a10 10 0 01-2.825.775 4.958 4.958 0 002.163-2.723c-.951.555-2.005.959-3.127 1.184a4.92 4.92 0 00-8.384 4.482C7.69 8.095 4.067 6.13 1.64 3.162a4.822 4.822 0 00-.666 2.475c0 1.71.87 3.213 2.188 4.096a4.904 4.904 0 01-2.228-.616v.06a4.923 4.923 0 003.946 4.827 4.996 4.996 0 01-2.212.085 4.936 4.936 0 004.604 3.417 9.867 9.867 0 01-6.102 2.105c-.39 0-.779-.023-1.17-.067a13.995 13.995 0 007.557 2.209c9.053 0 13.998-7.496 13.998-13.985 0-.21 0-.42-.015-.63A9.935 9.935 0 0024 4.59z"/>
                </svg>
              </div>
              <div className="social-icon">
                <svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" width="24" height="24">
                  <path fill="white" d="M12 2.163c3.204 0 3.584.012 4.85.07 3.252.148 4.771 1.691 4.919 4.919.058 1.265.069 1.645.069 4.849 0 3.205-.012 3.584-.069 4.849-.149 3.225-1.664 4.771-4.919 4.919-1.266.058-1.644.07-4.85.07-3.204 0-3.584-.012-4.849-.07-3.26-.149-4.771-1.699-4.919-4.92-.058-1.265-.07-1.644-.07-4.849 0-3.204.013-3.583.07-4.849.149-3.227 1.664-4.771 4.919-4.919 1.266-.057 1.645-.069 4.849-.069zm0-2.163c-3.259 0-3.667.014-4.947.072-4.358.2-6.78 2.618-6.98 6.98-.059 1.281-.073 1.689-.073 4.948 0 3.259.014 3.668.072 4.948.2 4.358 2.618 6.78 6.98 6.98 1.281.058 1.689.072 4.948.072 3.259 0 3.668-.014 4.948-.072 4.354-.2 6.782-2.618 6.979-6.98.059-1.28.073-1.689.073-4.948 0-3.259-.014-3.667-.072-4.947-.196-4.354-2.617-6.78-6.979-6.98-1.281-.059-1.69-.073-4.949-.073zm0 5.838c-3.403 0-6.162 2.759-6.162 6.162s2.759 6.163 6.162 6.163 6.162-2.759 6.162-6.163c0-3.403-2.759-6.162-6.162-6.162zm0 10.162c-2.209 0-4-1.79-4-4 0-2.209 1.791-4 4-4s4 1.791 4 4c0 2.21-1.791 4-4 4zm6.406-11.845c-.796 0-1.441.645-1.441 1.44s.645 1.44 1.441 1.44c.795 0 1.439-.645 1.439-1.44s-.644-1.44-1.439-1.44z"/>

import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react';
import './CinematicLogin.css';

const CinematicLogin = ({ onLogin }) => {
  const [isSignInMode, setIsSignInMode] = useState(true);
  const [isTrustedDevice, setIsTrustedDevice] = useState(false);
  const [formData, setFormData] = useState({
    name: '',
    email: '',
    password: '',
    confirmPassword: '',
    rememberMe: false,
    agreeToTerms: false
  });
  const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(false);
  const [error, setError] = useState('');
  const [cloudflareVerified, setCloudflareVerified] = useState(false);

  // Turnstile state

  const [turnstileWidgetId, setTurnstileWidgetId] = useState('');
  const [turnstileError, setTurnstileError] = useState('');
  const turnstileSiteKey = '0x4AAAAAAB9IaDdnFsA9yISn'; // Using same key as Chatty

  // Initialize Cloudflare Turnstile
  useEffect(() => {
    const loadTurnstile = () => {
      if (window.turnstile) {
        // Turnstile is already loaded
        return;
      }

      if (!turnstileSiteKey) {
        console.error('Turnstile site key is not configured.')
        setTurnstileError('Human verification is temporarily unavailable. Please contact support.')
        return;
      }
      
      const script = document.createElement('script');
      script.src = 'https://challenges.cloudflare.com/turnstile/v0/api.js';
      script.async = true;
      script.defer = true;
      document.head.appendChild(script);
    };

    loadTurnstile();
  }, [turnstileSiteKey]);

  // Initialize Turnstile widget when in signup mode
  useEffect(() => {
    if (!isSignInMode && window.turnstile && !turnstileWidgetId) {
      if (!turnstileSiteKey) {
        return;
      }
      const widgetId = window.turnstile.render('#turnstile-widget', {
        sitekey: turnstileSiteKey,
        callback: (token) => {
          setTurnstileToken(token);
          setTurnstileError('');
        },
        'error-callback': (error) => {
          setTurnstileError('Human verification failed. Please try again.');
          setTurnstileToken('');
        },
        'expired-callback': () => {
          setTurnstileError('Verification expired. Please verify again.');
          setTurnstileToken('');
        },
        theme: 'auto',
        size: 'normal'
      });
      setTurnstileWidgetId(widgetId);
    }
  }, [isSignInMode, turnstileWidgetId, turnstileSiteKey]);

  // Cleanup Turnstile widget when switching modes
  useEffect(() => {
    if (isSignInMode && turnstileWidgetId && window.turnstile) {
      window.turnstile.remove(turnstileWidgetId);
      setTurnstileWidgetId('');
      setTurnstileToken('');
      setTurnstileError('');
    }
  }, [isSignInMode, turnstileWidgetId]);
  useEffect(() => {
    // In a real app, this would check IP, device fingerprint, localStorage, etc.
    const simulateTrustedDevice = () => {
      const savedDevice = localStorage.getItem('vvault_trusted_device');
      if (savedDevice) {
        setIsTrustedDevice(true);
      } else {
        // Randomly assign for demo purposes
        const isTrusted = Math.random() > 0.5;
        setIsTrustedDevice(isTrusted);
        if (isTrusted) {
          localStorage.setItem('vvault_trusted_device', 'true');
        }
      }
    };

    simulateTrustedDevice();
  }, []);

  const handleInputChange = (e) => {
    const { name, value, type, checked } = e.target;
    setFormData(prev => ({
      ...prev,
      [name]: type === 'checkbox' ? checked : value
    }));
    setError(''); // Clear error on input change
  };

  const handleCloudflareVerification = () => {
    setCloudflareVerified(true);
  };

  const validateForm = () => {
    if (!formData.email || !formData.password) {
      setError('Email and password are required.');
      return false;
    }

    if (!isSignInMode) {
      if (!formData.name) {
        setError('Name is required.');
        return false;
      }
      if (formData.password !== formData.confirmPassword) {
        setError('Passwords do not match.');
        return false;
      }
      if (!formData.agreeToTerms) {
        setError('You must agree to the Terms of Service and Privacy Notice.');
        return false;
      }
      if (!cloudflareVerified) {
        setError('Please complete the human verification.');
        return false;
      }
    }

    return true;
  };

  const handleSubmit = async (e) => {
    e.preventDefault();
    
    if (!validateForm()) {
      return;
    }

    // Validate Turnstile for signup
    if (!isSignInMode && !turnstileToken) {
      setError('Please complete human verification.');
      return;
    }

    setIsLoading(true);
    setError('');

    try {
      // Prepare request data
      const requestData = {
        email: formData.email,
        password: formData.password,
        ...(isSignInMode ? {} : {
          name: formData.name,
          confirmPassword: formData.confirmPassword,
          turnstileToken: turnstileToken
        })
      };

      // Make API call to backend

      const response = await fetch(`http://localhost:8000${endpoint}`, {
        method: 'POST',
        headers: {
          'Content-Type': 'application/json',
        },
        body: JSON.stringify(requestData)
      });

      const result = await response.json();

      if (!response.ok) {
        throw new Error(result.error || 'Authentication failed');
      }

      // Store user session
      localStorage.setItem('vvault_user', JSON.stringify(result.user));
      localStorage.setItem('vvault_token', result.token);
      
      // Call parent callback
      onLogin(result.user);
    } catch (err) {
      setError(err.message || 'Authentication failed. Please try again.');
    } finally {
      setIsLoading(false);
    }
  };

            <p className="welcome-subtitle">
              {isSignInMode

                : 'Intelligent Memory. Guarded Sovereignty.'
              }
            </p>
            <p className="welcome-description">
              {isSignInMode 
                ? 'Click \'Remember Me\' to skip login on this device next time.'
                : 'Secure, immutable memory system that serves as a digital sanctuary for truth ‚Äî preserving data, identity, and history with absolute integrity beyond manipulation or decay.'
              }
            </p>
            
            <div className="social-links">
              <div className="social-icon">
                <svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" width="24" height="24">
                  <path fill="white" d="M24 12.073c0-6.627-5.373-12-12-12s-12 5.373-12 12c0 5.99 4.388 10.954 10.125 11.854v-8.385H7.078v-3.47h3.047V9.43c0-3.007 1.792-4.669 4.533-4.669 1.312 0 2.686.235 2.686.235v2.953H15.83c-1.491 0-1.956.925-1.956 1.874v2.25h3.328l-.532 3.47h-2.796v8.385C19.612 23.027 24 18.062 24 12.073z"/>
                </svg>
              </div>
              <div className="social-icon">
                <svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" width="24" height="24">
                  <path fill="white" d="M23.953 4.57a10 10 0 01-2.825.775 4.958 4.958 0 002.163-2.723c-.951.555-2.005.959-3.127 1.184a4.92 4.92 0 00-8.384 4.482C7.69 8.095 4.067 6.13 1.64 3.162a4.822 4.822 0 00-.666 2.475c0 1.71.87 3.213 2.188 4.096a4.904 4.904 0 01-2.228-.616v.06a4.923 4.923 0 003.946 4.827 4.996 4.996 0 01-2.212.085 4.936 4.936 0 004.604 3.417 9.867 9.867 0 01-6.102 2.105c-.39 0-.779-.023-1.17-.067a13.995 13.995 0 007.557 2.209c9.053 0 13.998-7.496 13.998-13.985 0-.21 0-.42-.015-.63A9.935 9.935 0 0024 4.59z"/>
                </svg>
              </div>
              <div className="social-icon">
                <svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" width="24" height="24">

                      <path fill="#000000" d="M18.71 19.5c-.83 1.24-1.71 2.45-3.05 2.47-1.34.03-1.77-.79-3.29-.79-1.53 0-2 .77-3.27.82-1.31.05-2.3-1.32-3.14-2.53C4.25 17 2.94 12.45 4.7 9.39c.87-1.52 2.43-2.48 4.12-2.51 1.28-.02 2.5.87 3.29.87.78 0 2.26-1.07 3.81-.91.65.03 2.47.26 3.64 1.98-.09.06-2.17 1.28-2.15 3.81.03 3.02 2.65 4.03 2.68 4.04-.03.07-.42 1.44-1.38 2.83M13 3.5c.73-.83 1.94-1.46 2.94-1.5.13 1.17-.34 2.35-1.04 3.19-.69.85-1.83 1.51-2.95 1.42-.15-1.15.41-2.35 1.05-3.11z"/>
                    </svg>
                    Apple
                  </button>
                  <button
                    type="button"
                    onClick={() => handleOAuth('GitHub')}
                    className="btn-oauth"
                    disabled={isLoading}
                  >
                    <svg className="oauth-icon" viewBox="0 0 24 24" width="20" height="20">
                      <path fill="#000000" d="M12 0c-6.626 0-12 5.373-12 12 0 5.302 3.438 9.8 8.207 11.387.599.111.793-.261.793-.577v-2.234c-3.338.726-4.033-1.416-4.033-1.416-.546-1.387-1.333-1.756-1.333-1.756-1.089-.745.083-.729.083-.729 1.205.084 1.839 1.237 1.839 1.237 1.07 1.834 2.807 1.304 3.492.997.107-.775.418-1.305.762-1.604-2.665-.305-5.467-1.334-5.467-5.931 0-1.311.469-2.381 1.236-3.221-.124-.303-.535-1.524.117-3.176 0 0 1.008-.322 3.301 1.23.957-.266 1.983-.399 3.003-.404 1.02.005 2.047.138 3.006.404 2.291-1.552 3.297-1.23 3.297-1.23.653 1.653.242 2.874.118 3.176.77.84 1.235 1.911 1.235 3.221 0 4.609-2.807 5.624-5.479 5.921.43.372.823 1.102.823 2.222v3.293c0 .319.192.694.801.576 4.765-1.589 8.199-6.086 8.199-11.386 0-6.627-5.373-12-12-12z"/>
                    </svg>
                    GitHub
                  </button>
                </div>
              </div>

              <div className="form-links">
                {isSignInMode ? (
                  <div className="form-toggle">
                    <span className="form-toggle-text">
                      Don't have an account?{' '}
                      <button
                        type="button"
                        onClick={() => setIsSignInMode(false)}
                        className="form-link"
                      >
                        Create one
                      </button>
                    </span>
                  </div>
                ) : (
                  <div className="form-toggle">
                    <span className="form-toggle-text">
                      Already have an account?{' '}
                      <button
                        type="button"
                        onClick={() => setIsSignInMode(true)}
                        className="form-link"
                      >
                        Sign in
                      </button>
                    </span>
                  </div>
                )}
              </div>
            </form>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  );
};

export default CinematicLogin;

```css
/* VVAULT Cinematic Login - Two Column Layout */

/* Main Container */
.cinematic-login-container {
  min-height: 100vh;
  width: 100vw;
  display: flex;
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
}

/* Background Images */
.cinematic-login-container {
  background-size: cover;
  background-position: center;
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-attachment: fixed;
}

/* Sunset Background - Observatory at Dusk */
.vvault-sunset-bg {
  background-image: url('/assets/vvault_sunset.png');
  background-size: cover;
  background-position: center;
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-attachment: fixed;
}

/* Sunrise Background - Snowy Pine Landscape */
.vvault-sunrise-bg {
  background-image: url('/assets/vvault_sunrise.png');
  background-size: cover;
  background-position: center;
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-attachment: fixed;
}

/* Fallback gradients if images don't load */
.vvault-sunset-bg {
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ff6b35, #f7931e, #ffd23f, #2c3e50);
}

.vvault-sunrise-bg {
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #87ceeb, #ffd700, #ffa500, #ffffff);
}

/* Two Column Layout */
.login-content {
  display: flex;
  width: 100%;
  min-height: 100vh;
  position: relative;
  z-index: 2;
}

/* Left Column - Welcome Section */
.welcome-section {
  flex: 1;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
  padding: 60px 80px;
  position: relative;
}

.welcome-content {
  text-align: left;
  max-width: 400px;
  width: 100%;
}

.welcome-section::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background: transparent;
  z-index: -1;
}

/* Right Column - Form Section */
.form-section {
  flex: 1;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
  padding: 60px 80px;
  position: relative;
}

.form-section::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4);
  backdrop-filter: blur(15px);
  z-index: -1;
}

/* Welcome Text Styling */
.welcome-title {
  font-family: 'League Spartan', sans-serif;
  font-size: 3.5rem;
  font-weight: 700;
  color: white;
  margin-bottom: 24px;
  line-height: 1.1;
}

.welcome-back {
  font-weight: 700;
}

.welcome-subtitle {
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9);
  margin-bottom: 40px;
  line-height: 1.6;
}

.welcome-description {
  font-size: 1rem;
  color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8);
  margin-bottom: 24px;
  line-height: 1.5;
  max-width: 400px;
}

/* Theme Indicator */
.theme-indicator {
  margin-bottom: 40px;
}

.theme-text {
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8);
  font-style: italic;
}

/* Social Links */
.social-links {
  display: flex;
  gap: 16px;
  margin-top: auto;
}

.social-icon {
  width: 40px;
  height: 40px;
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  border-radius: 50%;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
}

.social-icon svg {
  width: 24px;

}

.social-icon:hover {
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
  border-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5);

}

.login-form-container {

}

/* Form Styling */
.form-title {

}

}

  color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8) !important;
}

.form-input:focus {
  outline: none !important;
  border-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9) !important;
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 3px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2) !important;

.form-checkbox {

}

/* Buttons */
.btn-primary {
  width: auto;
  padding: 10px 20px;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ff6b35, #f7931e);

}

.password-link {
  margin-top: 6px;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  text-align: left;
}

.password-link .form-link {
  color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8);
  text-decoration: none;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  transition: color 0.3s ease;
}

.password-link .form-link:hover {
  color: white;
  text-decoration: underline;
}

.btn-primary:disabled {
  opacity: 0.6;
  cursor: not-allowed;
  transform: none;
}

/* OAuth Buttons */
.oauth-section {
  margin-top: 24px;
}

.oauth-divider {
  text-align: center;
  margin: 20px 0;
  color: white;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  position: relative;
  text-shadow: 1px 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
}

.oauth-divider::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  height: 1px;
  background: #e1e5e9;
  z-index: 1;
}

.oauth-divider span {
  padding: 0 16px;
  position: relative;
  z-index: 2;
}

.oauth-buttons {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
  gap: 12px;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.btn-oauth {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  padding: 8px 12px;
  border: 2px solid #e1e5e9;
  border-radius: 8px;
  background: white;
  color: #333;
  text-decoration: none;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  font-weight: 500;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  cursor: pointer;
}

.btn-oauth:hover {
  border-color: #ff6b35;
  background: #fff5f0;
  transform: translateY(-1px);
}

.oauth-icon {
  width: 20px;
  height: 20px;
  margin-right: 8px;
  flex-shrink: 0;
}

/* Form Links */
.form-links {
  text-align: center;
  margin-top: 20px;
}

.form-link {
  color: #ff6b35;
  text-decoration: none;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  font-weight: 500;
  background: none;
  border: none;
  padding: 0;
  cursor: pointer;
}

.form-link:hover {
  text-decoration: underline;
}

.form-toggle {
  margin-top: 16px;
  text-align: center;
}

.form-toggle-text {
  color: white;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  text-shadow: 1px 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
}

/* Turnstile Verification */
.turnstile-verification {
  margin: 20px 0;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;

}

.turnstile-error {

}

#turnstile-widget {
  margin: 0 auto;
}

.flex {
  display: flex;
}

.justify-center {
  justify-content: center;
}

/* Terms Checkbox */
.terms-checkbox {
  display: flex;
  align-items: flex-start;
  margin-bottom: 24px;
}

.terms-checkbox input {
  margin-right: 12px;
  margin-top: 2px;
  transform: scale(1.2);
}

.terms-checkbox label {
  font-size: 0.85rem;
  color: #666;
  line-height: 1.4;
}

.terms-link {
  color: #ff6b35;
  text-decoration: none;
}

.terms-link:hover {
  text-decoration: underline;
}

/* Responsive Design */
@media (max-width: 1024px) {
  .welcome-section,
  .form-section {
    padding: 40px 60px;
  }
  
  .welcome-title {
    font-size: 3rem;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .login-content {
    flex-direction: column;

  .welcome-section {
    padding: 40px 30px;
    align-items: center;
  }

    text-align: center;
    max-width: none;

  .form-section {
    padding: 30px;
  }
  
  .welcome-title {
    font-size: 2.5rem;
  }
  
  .login-form-container {
    padding: 30px;
  }

  .form-section {
    padding: 20px;
  }
  
  .welcome-title {
    font-size: 2rem;
  }
  
  .login-form-container {
    padding: 20px;
  }
  
  .oauth-buttons {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
  }
}

/* Mobile Portrait Background Adjustment */
@media (max-width: 768px) and (orientation: portrait) {
  .cinematic-login-container {
    background-attachment: scroll;
    background-size: cover;
    background-position: center top;
  }
}

/* Loading and Error States */
.loading-overlay {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  z-index: 1000;
}

.loading-spinner {
  width: 40px;
  height: 40px;
  border: 4px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
  border-top: 4px solid #ff6b35;
  border-radius: 50%;
  animation: spin 1s linear infinite;
}

@keyframes spin {
  0% { transform: rotate(0deg); }
  100% { transform: rotate(360deg); }
}

.error-message {
  background: #fee;
  color: #c33;
  padding: 12px 16px;
  border-radius: 8px;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  border: 1px solid #fcc;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}

.success-message {
  background: #efe;
  color: #363;
  padding: 12px 16px;
  border-radius: 8px;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  border: 1px solid #cfc;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}

    rgba(255, 165, 0, 0.1) 50%,
    rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1) 75%,
    rgba(240, 248, 255, 0.2) 100%
  );
  z-index: 1;
}

/* Fallback gradients with enhanced colors */
.vvault-sunset-bg {
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ff6b35, #f7931e, #ffd23f, #2c3e50);
}

.vvault-sunrise-bg {
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #87ceeb, #ffd700, #ffa500, #ffffff);
}

/* Two Column Layout */
.login-content {
  display: flex;
  width: 100%;
  min-height: 100vh;
  position: relative;
  z-index: 2;
}

/* Left Column - Welcome Section */
.welcome-section {
  flex: 1;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
  padding: 60px 80px;
  position: relative;
}

.welcome-content {
  text-align: left;
  max-width: 400px;
  width: 100%;
}

.welcome-section::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background: transparent;
  z-index: -1;
}

/* Right Column - Form Section */
.form-section {
  flex: 1;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
  padding: 60px 80px;
  position: relative;
}

.form-section::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4);
  backdrop-filter: blur(15px);
  z-index: -1;
}

/* Welcome Text Styling */
.welcome-title {
  font-family: 'League Spartan', sans-serif;
  font-size: 3.5rem;
  font-weight: 700;
  color: white;
  margin-bottom: 24px;
  line-height: 1.1;
}

.welcome-back {
  font-weight: 700;
}

.welcome-subtitle {
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9);
  margin-bottom: 40px;
  line-height: 1.6;
}

.welcome-description {
  font-size: 1rem;
  color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8);
  margin-bottom: 24px;
  line-height: 1.5;
  max-width: 400px;
}

/* Theme Indicator */
.theme-indicator {
  margin-bottom: 40px;
}

.theme-text {
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8);
  font-style: italic;
}

/* Social Links */
.social-links {
  display: flex;
  gap: 16px;
  margin-top: auto;
}

.social-icon {
  width: 40px;
  height: 40px;
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  border-radius: 50%;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
}

.social-icon svg {
  width: 24px;
  height: 24px;
}

.social-icon:hover {
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
  border-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5);
  transform: translateY(-2px);
}

/* Form Container */
.login-form-container {
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 400px;
}

/* Form Styling */
.form-title {
  font-size: 2rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: white;
  margin-bottom: 32px;
  text-align: center;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
}

.form-group {
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.form-label {
  display: block;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  font-weight: 500;
  color: white;
  margin-bottom: 8px;
  text-shadow: 1px 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
}

.form-input {
  width: 100% !important;
  padding: 12px 16px !important;
  border: 2px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5) !important;
  border-radius: 8px !important;
  font-size: 1rem !important;
  transition: all 0.3s ease !important;
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.15) !important;
  color: white !important;
  backdrop-filter: blur(10px) !important;
}

.form-input::placeholder {
  color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8) !important;
}

.form-input:focus {
  outline: none !important;
  border-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9) !important;
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 3px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2) !important;
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2) !important;
}

.form-checkbox {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  margin-bottom: 24px;
}

.form-checkbox input {
  margin-right: 8px;
  transform: scale(1.2);
}

.form-checkbox label {
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: 1px 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
}

/* Buttons */
.btn-primary {
  width: auto;
  padding: 10px 20px;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ff6b35, #f7931e);
  color: white;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 6px;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  align-self: flex-start;
}

.btn-primary:hover {
  transform: translateY(-2px);
  box-shadow: 0 8px 20px rgba(255, 107, 53, 0.4);
}

.password-link {
  margin-top: 6px;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  text-align: left;
}

.password-link .form-link {
  color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8);
  text-decoration: none;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  transition: color 0.3s ease;
}

.password-link .form-link:hover {
  color: white;
  text-decoration: underline;
}

.btn-primary:disabled {
  opacity: 0.6;
  cursor: not-allowed;
  transform: none;
}

/* OAuth Buttons */
.oauth-section {
  margin-top: 24px;
}

.oauth-divider {
  text-align: center;
  margin: 20px 0;
  color: white;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  position: relative;
  text-shadow: 1px 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
}

.oauth-divider::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  height: 1px;
  background: #e1e5e9;
  z-index: 1;
}

.oauth-divider span {
  padding: 0 16px;
  position: relative;
  z-index: 2;
}

.oauth-buttons {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
  gap: 12px;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.btn-oauth {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  padding: 8px 12px;
  border: 2px solid #e1e5e9;
  border-radius: 8px;
  background: white;
  color: #333;
  text-decoration: none;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  font-weight: 500;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  cursor: pointer;
}

.btn-oauth:hover {
  border-color: #ff6b35;
  background: #fff5f0;
  transform: translateY(-1px);
}

.oauth-icon {
  width: 20px;
  height: 20px;
  margin-right: 8px;
  flex-shrink: 0;
}

/* Form Links */
.form-links {
  text-align: center;
  margin-top: 20px;
}

.form-link {
  color: #ff6b35;
  text-decoration: none;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  font-weight: 500;
  background: none;
  border: none;
  padding: 0;
  cursor: pointer;
}

.form-link:hover {
  text-decoration: underline;
}

.form-toggle {
  margin-top: 16px;
  text-align: center;
}

.form-toggle-text {
  color: white;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  text-shadow: 1px 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
}

/* Turnstile Verification */
.turnstile-verification {
  margin: 20px 0;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 8px; /* space-y-2 equivalent */
}

.turnstile-error {
  color: #dc2626; /* text-red-600 */
  font-size: 0.75rem; /* text-xs */
  text-align: center;
}

#turnstile-widget {
  margin: 0 auto;
}

.flex {
  display: flex;
}

.justify-center {
  justify-content: center;
}

/* Terms Checkbox */
.terms-checkbox {
  display: flex;
  align-items: flex-start;
  margin-bottom: 24px;
}

.terms-checkbox input {
  margin-right: 12px;
  margin-top: 2px;
  transform: scale(1.2);
}

.terms-checkbox label {
  font-size: 0.85rem;
  color: #666;
  line-height: 1.4;
}

.terms-link {
  color: #ff6b35;
  text-decoration: none;
}

.terms-link:hover {
  text-decoration: underline;
}

/* Responsive Design */
@media (max-width: 1024px) {
  .welcome-section,
  .form-section {
    padding: 40px 60px;
  }
  
  .welcome-title {
    font-size: 3rem;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .login-content {
    flex-direction: column;
  }
  
  .welcome-section {
    padding: 40px 30px;
    align-items: center;
  }
  
  .welcome-content {
    text-align: center;
    max-width: none;
  }
  
  .form-section {
    padding: 30px;
  }
  
  .welcome-title {
    font-size: 2.5rem;
  }
  
  .login-form-container {
    padding: 30px;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 480px) {
  .welcome-section,
  .form-section {
    padding: 20px;
  }
  
  .welcome-title {
    font-size: 2rem;
  }
  
  .login-form-container {
    padding: 20px;
  }
  
  .oauth-buttons {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
  }
}

/* Mobile Portrait Background Adjustment */
@media (max-width: 768px) and (orientation: portrait) {
  .cinematic-login-container {
    background-attachment: scroll;
    background-size: cover;
    background-position: center top;
  }
}

/* Loading and Error States */
.loading-overlay {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  z-index: 1000;
}

.loading-spinner {
  width: 40px;
  height: 40px;
  border: 4px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
  border-top: 4px solid #ff6b35;
  border-radius: 50%;
  animation: spin 1s linear infinite;
}

@keyframes spin {
  0% { transform: rotate(0deg); }
  100% { transform: rotate(360deg); }
}

.error-message {
  background: #fee;
  color: #c33;
  padding: 12px 16px;
  border-radius: 8px;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  border: 1px solid #fcc;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}

.success-message {
  background: #efe;
  color: #363;
  padding: 12px 16px;
  border-radius: 8px;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  border: 1px solid #cfc;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}

  animation: slideInLeft 1s ease-out;
}

.welcome-content {
  text-align: left;
  max-width: 400px;
  width: 100%;
  animation: fadeInUp 1.2s ease-out 0.3s both;
}

.welcome-section::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background: transparent;
  z-index: -1;
}

/* Right Column - Form Section */
.form-section {
  flex: 1;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
  padding: 60px 80px;
  position: relative;
  animation: slideInRight 1s ease-out 0.2s both;
}

.form-section::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
  backdrop-filter: blur(15px);
  z-index: -1;
}

/* Welcome Text Styling */
.welcome-title {
  font-family: 'League Spartan', sans-serif;
  font-size: 3.5rem;
  font-weight: 700;
  color: white;
  margin-bottom: 24px;
  line-height: 1.1;
}

.welcome-back {
  font-weight: 700;
}

.welcome-subtitle {
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9);
  margin-bottom: 40px;
  line-height: 1.6;
}

.welcome-description {
  font-size: 1rem;
  color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8);
  margin-bottom: 24px;
  line-height: 1.5;
  max-width: 400px;
}

/* Theme Indicator */
.theme-indicator {
  margin-bottom: 40px;
}

.theme-text {
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8);
  font-style: italic;
}

/* Social Links */
.social-links {
  display: flex;
  gap: 16px;
  margin-top: auto;
}

.social-icon {
  width: 40px;
  height: 40px;
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  border-radius: 50%;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
}

.social-icon svg {
  width: 24px;
  height: 24px;
}

.social-icon:hover {
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
  border-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5);
  transform: translateY(-2px);
}

/* Form Container */
.login-form-container {
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 400px;
}

/* Form Styling */
.form-title {
  font-size: 2rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: white;
  margin-bottom: 32px;
  text-align: center;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
}

.form-group {
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.form-label {
  display: block;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  font-weight: 500;
  color: white;
  margin-bottom: 8px;
  text-shadow: 1px 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
}

.form-input {
  width: 100% !important;
  padding: 12px 16px !important;
  border: 2px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5) !important;
  border-radius: 8px !important;
  font-size: 1rem !important;
  transition: all 0.3s ease !important;
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.15) !important;
  color: white !important;
  backdrop-filter: blur(10px) !important;
}

.form-input::placeholder {
  color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8) !important;
}

.form-input:focus {
  outline: none !important;
  border-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9) !important;
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 3px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2) !important;
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2) !important;
}

.form-checkbox {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  margin-bottom: 24px;
}

.form-checkbox input {
  margin-right: 8px;
  transform: scale(1.2);
}

.form-checkbox label {
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: 1px 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
}

/* Buttons */
.btn-primary {
  width: auto;
  padding: 10px 20px;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ff6b35, #f7931e);
  color: white;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 6px;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  align-self: flex-start;
}

.btn-primary:hover {
  transform: translateY(-2px);
  box-shadow: 0 8px 20px rgba(255, 107, 53, 0.4);
}

.password-link {
  margin-top: 6px;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  text-align: left;
}

.password-link .form-link {
  color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8);
  text-decoration: none;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  transition: color 0.3s ease;
}

.password-link .form-link:hover {
  color: white;
  text-decoration: underline;
}

.btn-primary:disabled {
  opacity: 0.6;
  cursor: not-allowed;
  transform: none;
}

/* OAuth Buttons */
.oauth-section {
  margin-top: 24px;
}

.oauth-divider {
  text-align: center;
  margin: 20px 0;
  color: white;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  position: relative;
  text-shadow: 1px 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
}

.oauth-divider::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  height: 1px;
  background: #e1e5e9;
  z-index: 1;
}

.oauth-divider span {
  padding: 0 16px;
  position: relative;
  z-index: 2;
}

.oauth-buttons {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
  gap: 12px;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.btn-oauth {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  padding: 8px 12px;
  border: 2px solid #e1e5e9;
  border-radius: 8px;
  background: white;
  color: #333;
  text-decoration: none;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  font-weight: 500;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  cursor: pointer;
}

.btn-oauth:hover {
  border-color: #ff6b35;
  background: #fff5f0;
  transform: translateY(-1px);
}

.oauth-icon {
  width: 20px;
  height: 20px;
  margin-right: 8px;
  flex-shrink: 0;
}

/* Form Links */
.form-links {
  text-align: center;
  margin-top: 20px;
}

.form-link {
  color: #ff6b35;
  text-decoration: none;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  font-weight: 500;
  background: none;
  border: none;
  padding: 0;
  cursor: pointer;
}

.form-link:hover {
  text-decoration: underline;
}

.form-toggle {
  margin-top: 16px;
  text-align: center;
}

.form-toggle-text {
  color: white;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  text-shadow: 1px 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
}

/* Turnstile Verification */
.turnstile-verification {
  margin: 20px 0;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 8px; /* space-y-2 equivalent */
}

.turnstile-error {
  color: #dc2626; /* text-red-600 */
  font-size: 0.75rem; /* text-xs */
  text-align: center;
}

#turnstile-widget {
  margin: 0 auto;
}

.flex {
  display: flex;
}

.justify-center {
  justify-content: center;
}

/* Terms Checkbox */
.terms-checkbox {
  display: flex;
  align-items: flex-start;
  margin-bottom: 24px;
}

.terms-checkbox input {
  margin-right: 12px;
  margin-top: 2px;
  transform: scale(1.2);
}

.terms-checkbox label {
  font-size: 0.85rem;
  color: #666;
  line-height: 1.4;
}

.terms-link {
  color: #ff6b35;
  text-decoration: none;
}

.terms-link:hover {
  text-decoration: underline;
}

/* Responsive Design */
@media (max-width: 1024px) {
  .welcome-section,
  .form-section {
    padding: 40px 60px;
  }
  
  .welcome-title {
    font-size: 3rem;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .login-content {
    flex-direction: column;
  }
  
  .welcome-section {
    padding: 40px 30px;
    align-items: center;
  }
  
  .welcome-content {
    text-align: center;
    max-width: none;
  }
  
  .form-section {
    padding: 30px;
  }
  
  .welcome-title {
    font-size: 2.5rem;
  }
  
  .login-form-container {
    padding: 30px;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 480px) {
  .welcome-section,
  .form-section {
    padding: 20px;
  }
  
  .welcome-title {
    font-size: 2rem;
  }
  
  .login-form-container {
    padding: 20px;
  }
  
  .oauth-buttons {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
  }
}

/* Mobile Portrait Background Adjustment */
@media (max-width: 768px) and (orientation: portrait) {
  .cinematic-login-container {
    background-attachment: scroll;
    background-size: cover;
    background-position: center top;
  }
}

/* Loading and Error States */
.loading-overlay {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  z-index: 1000;
}

.loading-spinner {
  width: 40px;
  height: 40px;
  border: 4px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
  border-top: 4px solid #ff6b35;
  border-radius: 50%;
  animation: spin 1s linear infinite;
}

@keyframes spin {
  0% { transform: rotate(0deg); }
  100% { transform: rotate(360deg); }
}

.error-message {
  background: #fee;
  color: #c33;
  padding: 12px 16px;
  border-radius: 8px;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  border: 1px solid #fcc;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}

.success-message {
  background: #efe;
  color: #363;
  padding: 12px 16px;
  border-radius: 8px;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  border: 1px solid #cfc;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}

```css
/* VVAULT Cinematic Login - Enhanced Background */

/* Main Container */
.cinematic-login-container {
  min-height: 100vh;
  width: 100vw;
  display: flex;
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
}

/* Enhanced Background Images with Overlays */
.cinematic-login-container {
  background-size: cover;
  background-position: center;
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-attachment: fixed;
  position: relative;
}

/* Sunset Background - Observatory at Dusk with Enhanced Effects */
.vvault-sunset-bg {
  background-image: 
    linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(255, 107, 53, 0.3), rgba(247, 147, 30, 0.2)),
    url('/assets/vvault_sunset.png');
  background-size: cover;
  background-position: center;
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-attachment: fixed;
  position: relative;
}

.vvault-sunset-bg::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background: linear-gradient(
    135deg,
    rgba(255, 107, 53, 0.1) 0%,
    rgba(247, 147, 30, 0.2) 25%,
    rgba(255, 210, 63, 0.1) 50%,
    rgba(44, 62, 80, 0.3) 75%,
    rgba(52, 73, 94, 0.4) 100%
  );
  z-index: 1;
}

/* Sunrise Background - Snowy Pine Landscape with Enhanced Effects */
.vvault-sunrise-bg {
  background-image: 
    linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(135, 206, 235, 0.2), rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.1)),
    url('/assets/vvault_sunrise.png');
  background-size: cover;
  background-position: center;
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-attachment: fixed;
  position: relative;
}

.vvault-sunrise-bg::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background: linear-gradient(
    135deg,
    rgba(135, 206, 235, 0.1) 0%,
    rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.2) 25%,
    rgba(255, 165, 0, 0.1) 50%,
    rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1) 75%,
    rgba(240, 248, 255, 0.2) 100%
  );
  z-index: 1;
}

/* Fallback gradients with enhanced colors */
.vvault-sunset-bg {
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ff6b35, #f7931e, #ffd23f, #2c3e50);
}

.vvault-sunrise-bg {
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #87ceeb, #ffd700, #ffa500, #ffffff);
}

/* Two Column Layout */
.login-content {
  display: flex;
  width: 100%;
  min-height: 100vh;
  position: relative;
  z-index: 2;
  backdrop-filter: blur(0.5px);
}

/* Cinematic Effects */
@keyframes subtleGlow {
  0%, 100% { 
    box-shadow: 0 0 20px rgba(255, 107, 53, 0.1);
  }
  50% { 
    box-shadow: 0 0 30px rgba(255, 107, 53, 0.2);
  }
}

@keyframes fadeInUp {
  from {
    opacity: 0;
    transform: translateY(30px);
  }
  to {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: translateY(0);
  }
}

@keyframes slideInLeft {
  from {
    opacity: 0;
    transform: translateX(-50px);
  }
  to {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: translateX(0);
  }
}

@keyframes slideInRight {
  from {
    opacity: 0;
    transform: translateX(50px);
  }
  to {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: translateX(0);
  }
}

/* Left Column - Welcome Section */
.welcome-section {
  flex: 1;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
  padding: 60px 80px;
  position: relative;
  animation: slideInLeft 1s ease-out;
}

.welcome-content {
  text-align: left;
  max-width: 400px;
  width: 100%;
  animation: fadeInUp 1.2s ease-out 0.3s both;
}

.welcome-section::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background: transparent;
  z-index: -1;
}

/* Right Column - Form Section */
.form-section {
  flex: 1;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
  padding: 60px 80px;
  position: relative;
  animation: slideInRight 1s ease-out 0.2s both;
}

.form-section::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
  backdrop-filter: blur(15px);
  z-index: -1;
}

/* Welcome Text Styling */
.welcome-title {
  font-family: 'League Spartan', sans-serif;
  font-size: 3.5rem;
  font-weight: 700;
  color: white;
  margin-bottom: 24px;
  line-height: 1.1;
}

.welcome-back {
  font-weight: 700;
}

.welcome-subtitle {
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9);
  margin-bottom: 40px;
  line-height: 1.6;
}

.welcome-description {
  font-size: 1rem;
  color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8);
  margin-bottom: 24px;
  line-height: 1.5;
  max-width: 400px;
}

/* Theme Indicator */
.theme-indicator {
  margin-bottom: 40px;
}

.theme-text {
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8);
  font-style: italic;
}

/* Social Links */
.social-links {
  display: flex;
  gap: 16px;
  margin-top: auto;
}

.social-icon {
  width: 40px;
  height: 40px;
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  border-radius: 50%;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
}

.social-icon svg {
  width: 24px;
  height: 24px;
}

.social-icon:hover {
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
  border-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5);
  transform: translateY(-2px);
}

/* Form Container */
.login-form-container {
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 400px;
  animation: fadeInUp 1.2s ease-out 0.5s both;
  position: relative;
}

.login-form-container::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: -10px;
  left: -10px;
  right: -10px;
  bottom: -10px;
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.03);
  border-radius: 15px;
  backdrop-filter: blur(5px);
  z-index: -1;
}

/* Form Styling */
.form-title {
  font-size: 2rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: white;
  margin-bottom: 32px;
  text-align: center;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
}

.form-group {
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.form-label {
  display: block;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  font-weight: 500;
  color: white;
  margin-bottom: 8px;
  text-shadow: 1px 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
}

.form-input {
  width: 100% !important;
  padding: 12px 16px !important;
  border: 2px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5) !important;
  border-radius: 8px !important;
  font-size: 1rem !important;
  transition: all 0.3s ease !important;
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.15) !important;
  color: white !important;
  backdrop-filter: blur(10px) !important;
}

.form-input::placeholder {
  color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8) !important;
}

.form-input:focus {
  outline: none !important;
  border-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9) !important;
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 3px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2) !important;
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2) !important;
}

.form-checkbox {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  margin-bottom: 24px;
}

.form-checkbox input {
  margin-right: 8px;
  transform: scale(1.2);
}

.form-checkbox label {
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: 1px 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
}

/* Buttons */
.btn-primary {
  width: auto;
  padding: 12px 24px;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ff6b35, #f7931e);
  color: white;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 8px;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  align-self: flex-start;
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
  box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(255, 107, 53, 0.3);
}

.btn-primary::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: -100%;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  background: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2), transparent);
  transition: left 0.5s;
}

.btn-primary:hover::before {
  left: 100%;
}

.btn-primary:hover {
  transform: translateY(-3px);
  box-shadow: 0 12px 25px rgba(255, 107, 53, 0.5);
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ff7a4a, #ffa726);
}

.password-link {
  margin-top: 6px;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  text-align: left;
}

.password-link .form-link {
  color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8);
  text-decoration: none;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  transition: color 0.3s ease;
}

.password-link .form-link:hover {
  color: white;
  text-decoration: underline;
}

.btn-primary:disabled {
  opacity: 0.6;
  cursor: not-allowed;
  transform: none;
}

/* OAuth Buttons */
.oauth-section {
  margin-top: 24px;
}

.oauth-divider {
  text-align: center;
  margin: 20px 0;
  color: white;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  position: relative;
  text-shadow: 1px 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
}

.oauth-divider::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  height: 1px;
  background: #e1e5e9;
  z-index: 1;
}

.oauth-divider span {
  padding: 0 16px;
  position: relative;
  z-index: 2;
}

.oauth-buttons {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
  gap: 12px;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.btn-oauth {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  padding: 8px 12px;
  border: 2px solid #e1e5e9;
  border-radius: 8px;
  background: white;
  color: #333;
  text-decoration: none;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  font-weight: 500;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  cursor: pointer;
}

.btn-oauth:hover {
  border-color: #ff6b35;
  background: #fff5f0;
  transform: translateY(-1px);
}

.oauth-icon {
  width: 20px;
  height: 20px;
  margin-right: 8px;
  flex-shrink: 0;
}

/* Form Links */
.form-links {
  text-align: center;
  margin-top: 20px;
}

.form-link {
  color: #ff6b35;
  text-decoration: none;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  font-weight: 500;
  background: none;
  border: none;
  padding: 0;
  cursor: pointer;
}

.form-link:hover {
  text-decoration: underline;
}

.form-toggle {
  margin-top: 16px;
  text-align: center;
}

.form-toggle-text {
  color: white;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  text-shadow: 1px 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
}

/* Turnstile Verification */
.turnstile-verification {
  margin: 20px 0;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 8px; /* space-y-2 equivalent */
}

.turnstile-error {
  color: #dc2626; /* text-red-600 */
  font-size: 0.75rem; /* text-xs */
  text-align: center;
}

#turnstile-widget {
  margin: 0 auto;
}

.flex {
  display: flex;
}

.justify-center {
  justify-content: center;
}

.terms-checkbox {
  display: flex;
  align-items: flex-start;
  margin-bottom: 24px;
}

.terms-checkbox input {
  margin-right: 12px;
  margin-top: 2px;
  transform: scale(1.2);
}

.terms-checkbox label {
  font-size: 0.85rem;
  color: #666;
  line-height: 1.4;
}

.terms-link {
  color: #ff6b35;
