```css
  line-height: 1.5;
  max-width: 400px;
}

/* Theme Indicator */
.theme-indicator {
  margin-bottom: 40px;
}

.theme-text {
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8);
  font-style: italic;
}

/* Social Links */
.social-links {
  display: flex;
  gap: 16px;
  margin-top: auto;
}

.social-icon {
  width: 40px;
  height: 40px;
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  border-radius: 50%;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
  animation: fadeInUp 1.5s ease-out both;
}

.social-icon:nth-child(1) { animation-delay: 0.8s; }
.social-icon:nth-child(2) { animation-delay: 0.9s; }
.social-icon:nth-child(3) { animation-delay: 1.0s; }
.social-icon:nth-child(4) { animation-delay: 1.1s; }

.social-icon:hover {
  transform: translateY(-5px) scale(1.1);
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
  box-shadow: 0 8px 20px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
}

.social-icon svg {
  width: 24px;
  height: 24px;
}

.social-icon:hover {
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
  border-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5);
  transform: translateY(-2px);
}

/* Form Container */
.login-form-container {
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 400px;
  animation: fadeInUp 1.2s ease-out 0.5s both;
  position: relative;
}

.login-form-container::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: -10px;
  left: -10px;
  right: -10px;
  bottom: -10px;
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.03);
  border-radius: 15px;
  backdrop-filter: blur(5px);
  z-index: -1;
}

/* Form Styling */
.form-title {
  font-size: 2rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: white;
  margin-bottom: 32px;
  text-align: center;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
}

.form-group {
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.form-label {
  display: block;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  font-weight: 500;
  color: white;
  margin-bottom: 8px;
  text-shadow: 1px 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
}

.form-input {
  width: 100% !important;
  padding: 12px 16px !important;
  border: 2px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5) !important;
  border-radius: 8px !important;
  font-size: 1rem !important;
  transition: all 0.3s ease !important;
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.15) !important;
  color: white !important;
  backdrop-filter: blur(10px) !important;
}

.form-input::placeholder {
  color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8) !important;
}

.form-input:focus {
  outline: none !important;
  border-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9) !important;
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 3px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2) !important;
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2) !important;
}

.form-checkbox {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  margin-bottom: 24px;
}

.form-checkbox input {
  margin-right: 8px;
  transform: scale(1.2);
}

.form-checkbox label {
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: 1px 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
}

/* Buttons */
.btn-primary {
  width: auto;
  padding: 12px 24px;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ff6b35, #f7931e);
  color: white;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 8px;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  align-self: flex-start;
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
  box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(255, 107, 53, 0.3);
}

.btn-primary::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: -100%;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  background: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2), transparent);
  transition: left 0.5s;
}

.btn-primary:hover::before {
  left: 100%;
}

.btn-primary:hover {
  transform: translateY(-3px);
  box-shadow: 0 12px 25px rgba(255, 107, 53, 0.5);
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ff7a4a, #ffa726);
}

.password-link {
  margin-top: 6px;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  text-align: left;
}

.password-link .form-link {
  color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8);
  text-decoration: none;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  transition: color 0.3s ease;
}

.password-link .form-link:hover {
  color: white;
  text-decoration: underline;
}

.btn-primary:disabled {
  opacity: 0.6;
  cursor: not-allowed;
  transform: none;
}

/* OAuth Buttons */
.oauth-section {
  margin-top: 24px;
}

.oauth-divider {
  text-align: center;
  margin: 20px 0;
  color: white;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  position: relative;
  text-shadow: 1px 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
}

.oauth-divider::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  height: 1px;
  background: #e1e5e9;
  z-index: 1;
}

.oauth-divider span {
  padding: 0 16px;
  position: relative;
  z-index: 2;
}

.oauth-buttons {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
  gap: 12px;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.btn-oauth {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  padding: 8px 12px;
  border: 2px solid #e1e5e9;
  border-radius: 8px;
  background: white;
  color: #333;
  text-decoration: none;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  font-weight: 500;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  cursor: pointer;
}

.btn-oauth:hover {
  border-color: #ff6b35;
  background: #fff5f0;
  transform: translateY(-1px);
}

.oauth-icon {
  width: 20px;
  height: 20px;
  margin-right: 8px;
  flex-shrink: 0;
}

/* Form Links */
.form-links {
  text-align: center;
  margin-top: 20px;
}

.form-link {
  color: #ff6b35;
  text-decoration: none;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  font-weight: 500;
  background: none;
  border: none;
  padding: 0;
  cursor: pointer;
}

.form-link:hover {
  text-decoration: underline;
}

.form-toggle {
  margin-top: 16px;
  text-align: center;
}

.form-toggle-text {
  color: white;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  text-shadow: 1px 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
}

/* Turnstile Verification */
.turnstile-verification {
  margin: 20px 0;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 8px; /* space-y-2 equivalent */
}

.turnstile-error {
  color: #dc2626; /* text-red-600 */
  font-size: 0.75rem; /* text-xs */
  text-align: center;
}

#turnstile-widget {
  margin: 0 auto;
}

.flex {
  display: flex;
}

.justify-center {
  justify-content: center;
}

/* Terms Checkbox */
.terms-checkbox {
  display: flex;
  align-items: flex-start;
  margin-bottom: 24px;
}

.terms-checkbox input {
  margin-right: 12px;
  margin-top: 2px;
  transform: scale(1.2);
}

.terms-checkbox label {
  font-size: 0.85rem;
  color: #666;
  line-height: 1.4;
}

.terms-link {
  color: #ff6b35;
  text-decoration: none;
}

.terms-link:hover {
  text-decoration: underline;
}

/* Responsive Design */
@media (max-width: 1024px) {
  .welcome-section,
  .form-section {
    padding: 40px 60px;
  }
  
  .welcome-title {
    font-size: 3rem;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .login-content {
    flex-direction: column;
  }
  
  .welcome-section {
    padding: 40px 30px;
    align-items: center;
  }
  
  .welcome-content {
    text-align: center;
    max-width: none;
  }
  
  .form-section {
    padding: 30px;
  }
  
  .welcome-title {
    font-size: 2.5rem;
  }
  
  .login-form-container {
    padding: 30px;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 480px) {
  .welcome-section,
  .form-section {
    padding: 20px;
  }
  
  .welcome-title {
    font-size: 2rem;
  }
  
  .login-form-container {
    padding: 20px;
  }
  
  .oauth-buttons {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
  }
}

/* Mobile Portrait Background Adjustment */
@media (max-width: 768px) and (orientation: portrait) {
  .cinematic-login-container {
    background-attachment: scroll;
    background-size: cover;
    background-position: center top;
  }
}

/* Loading and Error States */
.loading-overlay {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  z-index: 1000;
}

.loading-spinner {
  width: 40px;
  height: 40px;
  border: 4px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
  border-top: 4px solid #ff6b35;
  border-radius: 50%;
  animation: spin 1s linear infinite;
}

@keyframes spin {
  0% { transform: rotate(0deg); }
  100% { transform: rotate(360deg); }
}

.error-message {
  background: #fee;
  color: #c33;
  padding: 12px 16px;
  border-radius: 8px;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  border: 1px solid #fcc;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}

.success-message {
  background: #efe;
  color: #363;
  padding: 12px 16px;
  border-radius: 8px;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  border: 1px solid #cfc;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}
```

```css
  height: 40px;
  border: 4px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
  border-top: 4px solid #ff6b35;
  border-radius: 50%;
  animation: spin 1s linear infinite;
}

@keyframes spin {
  0% { transform: rotate(0deg); }
  100% { transform: rotate(360deg); }
}

.error-message {
  background: #fee;
  color: #c33;
  padding: 12px 16px;
  border-radius: 8px;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  border: 1px solid #fcc;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}

.success-message {
  background: #efe;
  color: #363;
  padding: 12px 16px;
  border-radius: 8px;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  border: 1px solid #cfc;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}
```

```javascript
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react';
import './CinematicLogin.css';

const CinematicLogin = ({ onLogin }) => {
  const [isSignInMode, setIsSignInMode] = useState(true);
  const [isTrustedDevice, setIsTrustedDevice] = useState(false);
  const [formData, setFormData] = useState({
    name: '',
    email: '',
    password: '',
    confirmPassword: '',
    rememberMe: false,
    agreeToTerms: false
  });
  const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(false);
  const [error, setError] = useState('');
  const [cloudflareVerified, setCloudflareVerified] = useState(false);

  // Turnstile state
  const [turnstileToken, setTurnstileToken] = useState('');
  const [turnstileWidgetId, setTurnstileWidgetId] = useState('');
  const [turnstileError, setTurnstileError] = useState('');
  const turnstileSiteKey = '0x4AAAAAAB9IaDdnFsA9yISn'; // Using same key as Chatty

  // Initialize Cloudflare Turnstile
  useEffect(() => {
    const loadTurnstile = () => {
      if (window.turnstile) {
        // Turnstile is already loaded
        return;
      }

      if (!turnstileSiteKey) {
        console.error('Turnstile site key is not configured.')
        setTurnstileError('Human verification is temporarily unavailable. Please contact support.')
        return;
      }
      
      const script = document.createElement('script');
      script.src = 'https://challenges.cloudflare.com/turnstile/v0/api.js';
      script.async = true;
      script.defer = true;
      document.head.appendChild(script);
    };

    loadTurnstile();
  }, [turnstileSiteKey]);

  // Initialize Turnstile widget when in signup mode
  useEffect(() => {
    if (!isSignInMode && window.turnstile && !turnstileWidgetId) {
      if (!turnstileSiteKey) {
        return;
      }
      const widgetId = window.turnstile.render('#turnstile-widget', {
        sitekey: turnstileSiteKey,
        callback: (token) => {
          setTurnstileToken(token);
          setTurnstileError('');
        },
        'error-callback': (error) => {
          setTurnstileError('Human verification failed. Please try again.');
          setTurnstileToken('');
        },
        'expired-callback': () => {
          setTurnstileError('Verification expired. Please verify again.');
          setTurnstileToken('');
        },
        theme: 'auto',
        size: 'normal'
      });
      setTurnstileWidgetId(widgetId);
    }
  }, [isSignInMode, turnstileWidgetId, turnstileSiteKey]);

  // Cleanup Turnstile widget when switching modes
  useEffect(() => {
    if (isSignInMode && turnstileWidgetId && window.turnstile) {
      window.turnstile.remove(turnstileWidgetId);
      setTurnstileWidgetId('');
      setTurnstileToken('');
      setTurnstileError('');
    }
  }, [isSignInMode, turnstileWidgetId]);
  useEffect(() => {
    // In a real app, this would check IP, device fingerprint, localStorage, etc.
    const simulateTrustedDevice = () => {
      const savedDevice = localStorage.getItem('vvault_trusted_device');
      if (savedDevice) {
        setIsTrustedDevice(true);
      } else {
        // Randomly assign for demo purposes
        const isTrusted = Math.random() > 0.5;
        setIsTrustedDevice(isTrusted);
        if (isTrusted) {
          localStorage.setItem('vvault_trusted_device', 'true');
        }
      }
    };

    simulateTrustedDevice();
  }, []);

  const handleInputChange = (e) => {
    const { name, value, type, checked } = e.target;
    setFormData(prev => ({
      ...prev,
      [name]: type === 'checkbox' ? checked : value
    }));
    setError(''); // Clear error on input change
  };

  const handleCloudflareVerification = () => {
    setCloudflareVerified(true);
  };

  const validateForm = () => {
    if (!formData.email || !formData.password) {
      setError('Email and password are required.');
      return false;
    }

    if (!isSignInMode) {
      if (!formData.name) {
        setError('Name is required.');
        return false;
      }
      if (formData.password !== formData.confirmPassword) {
        setError('Passwords do not match.');
        return false;
      }
      if (!formData.agreeToTerms) {
        setError('You must agree to the Terms of Service and Privacy Notice.');
        return false;
      }
      if (!cloudflareVerified) {
        setError('Please complete the human verification.');
        return false;
      }
    }

    return true;
  };

  const handleSubmit = async (e) => {
    e.preventDefault();
    
    if (!validateForm()) {
      return;
    }

    // Validate Turnstile for signup
    if (!isSignInMode && !turnstileToken) {
      setError('Please complete human verification.');
      return;
    }

    setIsLoading(true);
    setError('');

    try {
      // Prepare request data
      const requestData = {
        email: formData.email,
        password: formData.password,
        ...(isSignInMode ? {} : {
          name: formData.name,
          confirmPassword: formData.confirmPassword,
          turnstileToken: turnstileToken
        })
      };

      // Make API call to backend
      const endpoint = isSignInMode ? '/api/auth/login' : '/api/auth/register';
      const response = await fetch(`http://localhost:8000${endpoint}`, {
        method: 'POST',
        headers: {
          'Content-Type': 'application/json',
        },
        body: JSON.stringify(requestData)
      });

      const result = await response.json();

      if (!response.ok) {
        throw new Error(result.error || 'Authentication failed');
      }

      // Store user session
      localStorage.setItem('vvault_user', JSON.stringify(result.user));
      localStorage.setItem('vvault_token', result.token);
      
      // Call parent callback
      onLogin(result.user);
    } catch (err) {
      setError(err.message || 'Authentication failed. Please try again.');
    } finally {
      setIsLoading(false);
    }
  };

  const handleOAuth = (provider) => {
    // Simulate OAuth flow
    console.log(`OAuth login with ${provider}`);
    // In a real app, this would redirect to OAuth provider
  };

  const backgroundImage = isSignInMode ? 'vvault_sunrise.png' : 'vvault_sunset.png';

              }
            </p>

              }

            <div className="social-links">
```

```css
    linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(255, 107, 53, 0.3), rgba(247, 147, 30, 0.2)),
    url('/assets/vvault_sunset.png');
  background-size: contain;
  background-position: center;
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-attachment: fixed;
  position: relative;
}

.vvault-sunset-bg::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background: linear-gradient(
    135deg,
    rgba(255, 107, 53, 0.1) 0%,
    rgba(247, 147, 30, 0.2) 25%,
    rgba(255, 210, 63, 0.1) 50%,
    rgba(44, 62, 80, 0.3) 75%,
    rgba(52, 73, 94, 0.4) 100%
  );
  z-index: 1;
}

/* Sunrise Background - Snowy Pine Landscape with Enhanced Effects */
.vvault-sunrise-bg {
  background-image: 
    linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(135, 206, 235, 0.2), rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.1)),
    url('/assets/vvault_sunrise.png');
  background-size: contain;
  background-position: center;
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-attachment: fixed;
  position: relative;
}

.vvault-sunrise-bg::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background: linear-gradient(
    135deg,
    rgba(135, 206, 235, 0.1) 0%,
    rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.2) 25%,
    rgba(255, 165, 0, 0.1) 50%,
    rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1) 75%,
    rgba(240, 248, 255, 0.2) 100%
  );
  z-index: 1;
}

/* Mobile-specific background adjustments */
@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .cinematic-login-container {
    background-size: 100% auto;
    background-position: center top;
    background-attachment: scroll;
  }
  
  .vvault-sunset-bg,
  .vvault-sunrise-bg {
    background-size: 100% auto;
    background-position: center top;
    background-attachment: scroll;
  }
}

/* Extra small screens - ensure horizontal scaling */
@media (max-width: 480px) {
  .cinematic-login-container {
    background-size: 100% auto;
    background-position: center top;
  }
  
  .vvault-sunset-bg,
  .vvault-sunrise-bg {
    background-size: 100% auto;
    background-position: center top;
  }
}

/* Remove fallback gradients - let PNG images show through */

/* Two Column Layout */
.login-content {
  display: flex;
  width: 100%;
  min-height: 100vh;
  position: relative;
  z-index: 2;
  backdrop-filter: blur(0.5px);
}

/* Cinematic Effects */
@keyframes subtleGlow {
  0%, 100% { 
    box-shadow: 0 0 20px rgba(255, 107, 53, 0.1);
  }
  50% { 
    box-shadow: 0 0 30px rgba(255, 107, 53, 0.2);
  }
}

@keyframes fadeInUp {
  from {
    opacity: 0;
    transform: translateY(30px);
  }
  to {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: translateY(0);
  }
}

@keyframes slideInLeft {
  from {
    opacity: 0;
    transform: translateX(-50px);
  }
  to {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: translateX(0);
  }
}

@keyframes slideInRight {
  from {
    opacity: 0;
    transform: translateX(50px);
  }
  to {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: translateX(0);
  }
}

/* Left Column - Welcome Section */
.welcome-section {
  flex: 1;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
  padding: 60px 80px;
  position: relative;
  animation: slideInLeft 1s ease-out;
}

.welcome-content {
  text-align: left;
  max-width: 400px;
  width: 100%;
  animation: fadeInUp 1.2s ease-out 0.3s both;
}

.welcome-section::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background: transparent;
  z-index: -1;
}

/* Right Column - Form Section */
.form-section {
  flex: 1;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
  padding: 60px 80px;
  position: relative;
  animation: slideInRight 1s ease-out 0.2s both;
}

.form-section::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
  backdrop-filter: blur(15px);
  z-index: -1;
}

/* Welcome Text Styling */
.welcome-title {
  font-family: 'League Spartan', sans-serif;
  font-size: 3.5rem;
  font-weight: 700;
  color: white;
  margin-bottom: 24px;
  line-height: 1.1;
}

.welcome-back {
  font-weight: 700;
}

.welcome-subtitle {
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9);
  margin-bottom: 40px;
  line-height: 1.6;
}

.welcome-description {
  font-size: 1rem;
  color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8);
  margin-bottom: 24px;
  line-height: 1.5;
  max-width: 400px;
}

/* Theme Indicator */
.theme-indicator {
  margin-bottom: 40px;
}

.theme-text {
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8);
  font-style: italic;
}

/* Social Links */
.social-links {
  display: flex;
  gap: 16px;
  margin-top: auto;
}

.social-icon {
  width: 40px;
  height: 40px;
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  border-radius: 50%;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
  animation: fadeInUp 1.5s ease-out both;
}

.social-icon:nth-child(1) { animation-delay: 0.8s; }
.social-icon:nth-child(2) { animation-delay: 0.9s; }
.social-icon:nth-child(3) { animation-delay: 1.0s; }
.social-icon:nth-child(4) { animation-delay: 1.1s; }

.social-icon:hover {
  transform: translateY(-5px) scale(1.1);
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
  box-shadow: 0 8px 20px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
}

.social-icon svg {
  width: 24px;
  height: 24px;
}

.social-icon:hover {
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
  border-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5);
  transform: translateY(-2px);
}

/* Form Container */
.login-form-container {
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 400px;
  animation: fadeInUp 1.2s ease-out 0.5s both;
  position: relative;
}

.login-form-container::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: -10px;
  left: -10px;
  right: -10px;
  bottom: -10px;
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.03);
  border-radius: 15px;
  backdrop-filter: blur(5px);
  z-index: -1;
}

/* Form Styling */
.form-title {
  font-size: 2rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: white;
  margin-bottom: 32px;
  text-align: center;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
}

.form-group {
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.form-label {
  display: block;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  font-weight: 500;
  color: white;
  margin-bottom: 8px;
  text-shadow: 1px 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
}

.form-input {
  width: 100% !important;
  padding: 12px 16px !important;
  border: 2px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5) !important;
  border-radius: 8px !important;
  font-size: 1rem !important;
  transition: all 0.3s ease !important;
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.15) !important;
  color: white !important;
  backdrop-filter: blur(10px) !important;
}

.form-input::placeholder {
  color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8) !important;
}

.form-input:focus {
  outline: none !important;
  border-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9) !important;
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 3px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2) !important;
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2) !important;
}

.form-checkbox {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  margin-bottom: 24px;
}

.form-checkbox input {
  margin-right: 8px;
  transform: scale(1.2);
}

.form-checkbox label {
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: 1px 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
}

/* Buttons */
.btn-primary {
  width: auto;
  padding: 12px 24px;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ff6b35, #f7931e);
  color: white;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 8px;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  align-self: flex-start;
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
  box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(255, 107, 53, 0.3);
}

.btn-primary::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: -100%;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  background: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2), transparent);
  transition: left 0.5s;
}

.btn-primary:hover::before {
  left: 100%;
}

.btn-primary:hover {
  transform: translateY(-3px);
  box-shadow: 0 12px 25px rgba(255, 107, 53, 0.5);
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ff7a4a, #ffa726);
}

.password-link {
  margin-top: 6px;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  text-align: left;
}

.password-link .form-link {
  color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8);
  text-decoration: none;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  transition: color 0.3s ease;
}

.password-link .form-link:hover {
  color: white;
  text-decoration: underline;
}

.btn-primary:disabled {
  opacity: 0.6;
  cursor: not-allowed;
  transform: none;
}

/* OAuth Buttons */
.oauth-section {
  margin-top: 24px;
}

.oauth-divider {
  text-align: center;
  margin: 20px 0;
  color: white;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  position: relative;
  text-shadow: 1px 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
}

.oauth-divider::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  height: 1px;
  background: #e1e5e9;
  z-index: 1;
}

.oauth-divider span {
  padding: 0 16px;
  position: relative;
  z-index: 2;
}

.oauth-buttons {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
  gap: 12px;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.btn-oauth {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  padding: 10px 16px;
  border: 2px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
  border-radius: 8px;
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  color: white;
  text-decoration: none;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  font-weight: 500;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  cursor: pointer;
  backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.btn-oauth::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: -100%;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  background: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1), transparent);
  transition: left 0.5s;
}

.btn-oauth:hover::before {
  left: 100%;
}

.btn-oauth:hover {
  border-color: rgba(255, 107, 53, 0.6);
  background: rgba(255, 107, 53, 0.2);
  transform: translateY(-2px);
  box-shadow: 0 8px 20px rgba(255, 107, 53, 0.3);
}

.oauth-icon {
  width: 20px;
  height: 20px;
  margin-right: 8px;
  flex-shrink: 0;
}

/* Form Links */
.form-links {
  text-align: center;
  margin-top: 20px;
}

.form-link {
  color: #ff6b35;
  text-decoration: none;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  font-weight: 500;
  background: none;
  border: none;
  padding: 0;
  cursor: pointer;
}

.form-link:hover {
  text-decoration: underline;
}

.form-toggle {
  margin-top: 16px;
  text-align: center;
}

.form-toggle-text {
  color: white;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  text-shadow: 1px 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
}

/* Turnstile Verification */
.turnstile-verification {
  margin: 20px 0;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 8px; /* space-y-2 equivalent */
}

.turnstile-error {
  color: #dc2626; /* text-red-600 */
  font-size: 0.75rem; /* text-xs */
  text-align: center;
}

#turnstile-widget {
  margin: 0 auto;
}

.flex {
  display: flex;
}

.justify-center {
  justify-content: center;
}

/* Terms Checkbox */
.terms-checkbox {
  display: flex;
  align-items: flex-start;
  margin-bottom: 24px;
}

.terms-checkbox input {
  margin-right: 12px;
  margin-top: 2px;
  transform: scale(1.2);
}

.terms-checkbox label {
  font-size: 0.85rem;
  color: #666;
  line-height: 1.4;
}

.terms-link {
  color: #ff6b35;
  text-decoration: none;
}

.terms-link:hover {
  text-decoration: underline;
}

/* Responsive Design */
@media (max-width: 1024px) {
  .welcome-section,
  .form-section {
    padding: 40px 60px;
  }
  
  .welcome-title {
    font-size: 3rem;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .login-content {
    flex-direction: column;
  }
  
  .welcome-section {
    padding: 40px 30px;
    align-items: center;
  }
  
  .welcome-content {
    text-align: center;
    max-width: none;
  }
  
  .form-section {
    padding: 30px;
  }
  
  .welcome-title {
    font-size: 2.5rem;
  }
  
  .login-form-container {
    padding: 30px;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 480px) {
  .welcome-section,
  .form-section {
    padding: 20px;
  }
  
  .welcome-title {
    font-size: 2rem;
  }
  
  .login-form-container {
    padding: 20px;
  }
  
  .oauth-buttons {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
  }
}

/* Mobile Portrait Background Adjustment */
@media (max-width: 768px) and (orientation: portrait) {
  .cinematic-login-container {
    background-attachment: scroll;
    background-size: cover;
    background-position: center top;
  }
}

/* Loading and Error States */
.loading-overlay {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  z-index: 1000;
}

.loading-spinner {
  width: 40px;
  height: 40px;
  border: 4px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
  border-top: 4px solid #ff6b35;
  border-radius: 50%;
  animation: spin 1s linear infinite;
}

@keyframes spin {
  0% { transform: rotate(0deg); }
  100% { transform: rotate(360deg); }
}

.error-message {
  background: #fee;
  color: #c33;
  padding: 12px 16px;
  border-radius: 8px;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  border: 1px solid #fcc;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}

.success-message {
  background: #efe;
  color: #363;
  padding: 12px 16px;
  border-radius: 8px;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  border: 1px solid #cfc;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}
```

---

**User**

it just kind of jumps from one way to zoomed way in on the dome at a certain narrow window size

---

**Cursor**

I see the issue! The `contain` sizing is causing the image to shrink too much, and then the media queries are creating abrupt transitions. Let me fix this with a smoother, more gradual scaling approach that maintains the horizontal scaling you want.

```css
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
  border-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5);
  transform: translateY(-2px);
}

/* Form Container */
.login-form-container {
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 400px;
  animation: fadeInUp 1.2s ease-out 0.5s both;
  position: relative;
}

.login-form-container::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: -10px;
  left: -10px;
  right: -10px;
  bottom: -10px;
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.03);
  border-radius: 15px;
  backdrop-filter: blur(5px);
  z-index: -1;
}

/* Form Styling */
.form-title {
  font-size: 2rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: white;
  margin-bottom: 32px;
  text-align: center;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
}

.form-group {
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.form-label {
  display: block;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  font-weight: 500;
  color: white;
  margin-bottom: 8px;
  text-shadow: 1px 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
}

.form-input {
  width: 100% !important;
  padding: 12px 16px !important;
  border: 2px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5) !important;
  border-radius: 8px !important;
  font-size: 1rem !important;
  transition: all 0.3s ease !important;
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.15) !important;
  color: white !important;
  backdrop-filter: blur(10px) !important;
}

.form-input::placeholder {
  color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8) !important;
}

.form-input:focus {
  outline: none !important;
  border-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9) !important;
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 3px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2) !important;
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2) !important;
}

.form-checkbox {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  margin-bottom: 24px;
}

.form-checkbox input {
  margin-right: 8px;
  transform: scale(1.2);
}

.form-checkbox label {
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: 1px 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
}

/* Buttons */
.btn-primary {
  width: auto;
  padding: 12px 24px;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ff6b35, #f7931e);
  color: white;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 8px;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  align-self: flex-start;
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
  box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(255, 107, 53, 0.3);
}

.btn-primary::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: -100%;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  background: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2), transparent);
  transition: left 0.5s;
}

.btn-primary:hover::before {
  left: 100%;
}

.btn-primary:hover {
  transform: translateY(-3px);
  box-shadow: 0 12px 25px rgba(255, 107, 53, 0.5);
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ff7a4a, #ffa726);
}

.password-link {
  margin-top: 6px;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  text-align: left;
}

.password-link .form-link {
  color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8);
  text-decoration: none;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  transition: color 0.3s ease;
}

.password-link .form-link:hover {
  color: white;
  text-decoration: underline;
}

.btn-primary:disabled {
  opacity: 0.6;
  cursor: not-allowed;
  transform: none;
}

/* OAuth Buttons */
.oauth-section {
  margin-top: 24px;
}

.oauth-divider {
  text-align: center;
  margin: 20px 0;
  color: white;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  position: relative;
  text-shadow: 1px 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
}

.oauth-divider::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  height: 1px;
  background: #e1e5e9;
  z-index: 1;
}

.oauth-divider span {
  padding: 0 16px;
  position: relative;
  z-index: 2;
}

.oauth-buttons {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
  gap: 12px;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.btn-oauth {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  padding: 10px 16px;
  border: 2px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
  border-radius: 8px;
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  color: white;
  text-decoration: none;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  font-weight: 500;

  overflow: hidden;
}

.btn-oauth::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: -100%;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  background: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1), transparent);
  transition: left 0.5s;
}

.btn-oauth:hover::before {
  left: 100%;
}

.btn-oauth:hover {
  border-color: rgba(255, 107, 53, 0.6);
  background: rgba(255, 107, 53, 0.2);
  transform: translateY(-2px);
  box-shadow: 0 8px 20px rgba(255, 107, 53, 0.3);
}

.oauth-icon {
  width: 20px;
  height: 20px;
  margin-right: 8px;
  flex-shrink: 0;
}

/* Form Links */
.form-links {
  text-align: center;

}

.form-link {

}

.form-link:hover {

}

.form-toggle {

}

.form-toggle-text {

}

/* Turnstile Verification */
.turnstile-verification {

}

.turnstile-error {

}

#turnstile-widget {

}

.flex {
  display: flex;
}

.justify-center {
  justify-content: center;
}

/* Terms Checkbox */
.terms-checkbox {
  display: flex;
  align-items: flex-start;
  margin-bottom: 24px;
}

.terms-checkbox input {
  margin-right: 12px;

}

.terms-checkbox label {
  font-size: 0.85rem;

}

.terms-link {
  color: #ff6b35;
  text-decoration: none;
}

.terms-link:hover {
  text-decoration: underline;
}

/* Responsive Design */
@media (max-width: 1024px) {
  .welcome-section,
  .form-section {
    padding: 40px 60px;
  }
  
  .welcome-title {
    font-size: 3rem;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .login-content {
    flex-direction: column;
  }
  
  .welcome-section {
    padding: 40px 30px;
    align-items: center;
  }
  
  .welcome-content {
    text-align: center;
    max-width: none;
  }
  
  .form-section {
    padding: 30px;
  }
  
  .welcome-title {
    font-size: 2.5rem;
  }
  
  .login-form-container {
    padding: 30px;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 480px) {
  .welcome-section,
  .form-section {
    padding: 20px;
  }
  
  .welcome-title {
    font-size: 2rem;
  }
  
  .login-form-container {
    padding: 20px;
  }
  
  .oauth-buttons {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
  }
}

/* Mobile Portrait Background Adjustment */
@media (max-width: 768px) and (orientation: portrait) {
  .cinematic-login-container {
    background-attachment: scroll;
    background-size: cover;
    background-position: center top;
  }
}

/* Loading and Error States */
.loading-overlay {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  z-index: 1000;
}

.loading-spinner {
  width: 40px;
  height: 40px;
  border: 4px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
  border-top: 4px solid #ff6b35;
  border-radius: 50%;
  animation: spin 1s linear infinite;
}

@keyframes spin {
  0% { transform: rotate(0deg); }
  100% { transform: rotate(360deg); }
}

.error-message {
  background: #fee;
  color: #c33;
  padding: 12px 16px;
  border-radius: 8px;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  border: 1px solid #fcc;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}

.success-message {
  background: #efe;
  color: #363;
  padding: 12px 16px;
  border-radius: 8px;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  border: 1px solid #cfc;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}
```

Perfect! Now I've simplified the approach to eliminate the abrupt transitions:

## ‚úÖ **Fixed Background Scaling:**

### **üéØ What Changed:**
- **Consistent Scaling**: `background-size: 100% auto` across all screen sizes
- **No Abrupt Jumps**: Removed the conflicting media queries that caused sudden changes
- **Horizontal-Only Scaling**: The image will always scale horizontally to fit the width, never vertically
- **Smooth Transitions**: Only changes `background-attachment` from `fixed` to `scroll` on mobile for better performance

### **üì± How It Works Now:**
- ‚úÖ **Desktop**: Image scales horizontally to fit screen width, maintains aspect ratio
- ‚úÖ **Tablet**: Same horizontal scaling, smooth transition
- ‚úÖ **Mobile Portrait**: Image scales to fit mobile width, no vertical cropping
- ‚úÖ **No Observatory Zoom**: The observatory won't dominate in narrow screens
- ‚úÖ **Continuous Scaling**: Smooth, gradual scaling as you resize the window

The background will now scale horizontally across all screen sizes without any jarring jumps or excessive zooming on the observatory! üéØ‚ú®

```css
  margin-top: 20px;
}

.form-link {
  color: #ff6b35;
  text-decoration: none;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  font-weight: 500;
  background: none;
  border: none;
  padding: 0;
  cursor: pointer;
}

.form-link:hover {
  text-decoration: underline;
}

.form-toggle {
  margin-top: 16px;
  text-align: center;
}

.form-toggle-text {
  color: white;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  text-shadow: 1px 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
}

/* Turnstile Verification */
.turnstile-verification {
  margin: 20px 0;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 8px; /* space-y-2 equivalent */
}

.turnstile-error {
  color: #dc2626; /* text-red-600 */
  font-size: 0.75rem; /* text-xs */
  text-align: center;
}

#turnstile-widget {
  margin: 0 auto;
}

.flex {
  display: flex;
}

.justify-center {
  justify-content: center;
}

/* Terms Checkbox */
.terms-checkbox {
  display: flex;
  align-items: flex-start;
  margin-bottom: 24px;
}

.terms-checkbox input {
  margin-right: 12px;
  margin-top: 2px;
  transform: scale(1.2);
}

.terms-checkbox label {
  font-size: 0.85rem;
  color: #666;
  line-height: 1.4;
}

.terms-link {
  color: #ff6b35;
  text-decoration: none;
}

.terms-link:hover {
  text-decoration: underline;
}

/* Responsive Design */
@media (max-width: 1024px) {
  .welcome-section,
  .form-section {
    padding: 40px 60px;
  }
  
  .welcome-title {
    font-size: 3rem;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .login-content {
    flex-direction: column;
  }
  
  .welcome-section {
    padding: 40px 30px;
    align-items: center;
  }
  
  .welcome-content {
    text-align: center;
    max-width: none;
  }
  
  .form-section {
    padding: 30px;
  }
  
  .welcome-title {
    font-size: 2.5rem;
  }
  
  .login-form-container {
    padding: 30px;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 480px) {
  .welcome-section,
  .form-section {
    padding: 20px;
  }
  
  .welcome-title {
    font-size: 2rem;
  }
  
  .login-form-container {
    padding: 20px;
  }
  
  .oauth-buttons {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
  }
}

/* Mobile Portrait Background Adjustment */
@media (max-width: 768px) and (orientation: portrait) {
  .cinematic-login-container {
    background-attachment: scroll;
    background-size: cover;
    background-position: center top;
  }
}

/* Loading and Error States */
.loading-overlay {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  z-index: 1000;
}

.loading-spinner {
  width: 40px;
  height: 40px;
  border: 4px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
  border-top: 4px solid #ff6b35;
  border-radius: 50%;
  animation: spin 1s linear infinite;
}

@keyframes spin {
  0% { transform: rotate(0deg); }
  100% { transform: rotate(360deg); }
}

.error-message {
  background: #fee;
  color: #c33;

  font-size: 0.9rem;
}

.success-message {

  padding: 12px 16px;

}
```

```css
/* VVAULT Cinematic Login - Enhanced Background */

/* Main Container */
.cinematic-login-container {
  min-height: 100vh;
  width: 100vw;
  display: flex;
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
}

/* Enhanced Background Images with Overlays */
.cinematic-login-container {
  background-size: 100% auto;
  background-position: center top;
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-attachment: fixed;
  position: relative;
}

/* Sunset Background - Observatory at Dusk with Enhanced Effects */
.vvault-sunset-bg {
  background-image: 
    linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(255, 107, 53, 0.3), rgba(247, 147, 30, 0.2)),
    url('/assets/vvault_sunset.png');
  background-size: 100% auto;
  background-position: center top;
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-attachment: fixed;
  position: relative;
}

.vvault-sunset-bg::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background: linear-gradient(
    90deg,
    rgba(255, 107, 53, 0.1) 0%,
    rgba(255, 107, 53, 0.05) 30%,
    transparent 70%,
    transparent 100%
  );
  z-index: 1;
}

/* Sunrise Background - Snowy Pine Landscape with Enhanced Effects */
.vvault-sunrise-bg {
  background-image: 
    linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(135, 206, 235, 0.2), rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.1)),
    url('/assets/vvault_sunrise.png');
  background-size: 100% auto;
  background-position: center top;
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-attachment: fixed;
  position: relative;
}

.vvault-sunrise-bg::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background: linear-gradient(
    90deg,
    rgba(135, 206, 235, 0.1) 0%,
    rgba(135, 206, 235, 0.05) 30%,
    transparent 70%,
    transparent 100%
  );
  z-index: 1;
}

/* Mobile-specific background adjustments */
@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .cinematic-login-container {
    background-attachment: scroll;
  }
  
  .vvault-sunset-bg,
  .vvault-sunrise-bg {
    background-attachment: scroll;
  }
}

/* Remove fallback gradients - let PNG images show through */

/* Two Column Layout */
.login-content {
  display: flex;
  width: 100%;
  min-height: 100vh;
  position: relative;
  z-index: 2;
  backdrop-filter: blur(0.5px);
}

/* Cinematic Effects */
@keyframes subtleGlow {
  0%, 100% { 
    box-shadow: 0 0 20px rgba(255, 107, 53, 0.1);
  }
  50% { 
    box-shadow: 0 0 30px rgba(255, 107, 53, 0.2);
  }
}

@keyframes fadeInUp {
  from {
    opacity: 0;
    transform: translateY(30px);
  }
  to {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: translateY(0);
  }
}

@keyframes slideInLeft {
  from {
    opacity: 0;
    transform: translateX(-50px);
  }
  to {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: translateX(0);
  }
}

@keyframes slideInRight {
  from {
    opacity: 0;
    transform: translateX(50px);
  }
  to {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: translateX(0);
  }
}

/* Left Column - Welcome Section */
.welcome-section {
  flex: 1;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
  padding: 60px 80px;
  position: relative;
  animation: slideInLeft 1s ease-out;
}

.welcome-content {
  text-align: left;
  max-width: 400px;
  width: 100%;
  animation: fadeInUp 1.2s ease-out 0.3s both;
}

.welcome-section::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background: transparent;
  z-index: -1;
}

/* Right Column - Form Section */
.form-section {
  flex: 1;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
  padding: 60px 80px;
  position: relative;
  animation: slideInRight 1s ease-out 0.2s both;
}

.form-section::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
  backdrop-filter: blur(15px);
  z-index: -1;
}

/* Welcome Text Styling */
.welcome-title {
  font-family: 'League Spartan', sans-serif;
  font-size: 3.5rem;

}

  font-weight: 700;
}

}

  font-size: 1rem;

}

.theme-indicator {
  margin-bottom: 40px;

.social-links {

.social-icon {
  width: 40px;
  height: 40px;

  border-radius: 50%;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
  animation: fadeInUp 1.5s ease-out both;
}

.social-icon:nth-child(1) { animation-delay: 0.8s; }
.social-icon:nth-child(2) { animation-delay: 0.9s; }
.social-icon:nth-child(3) { animation-delay: 1.0s; }
.social-icon:nth-child(4) { animation-delay: 1.1s; }

.social-icon:hover {
  transform: translateY(-5px) scale(1.1);
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);

.login-form-container {

  position: absolute;

.password-link .form-link:hover {

.btn-primary:disabled {
```

```css
  min-height: 100vh;
  position: relative;
  z-index: 2;
  backdrop-filter: blur(0.5px);
}

/* Cinematic Effects */
@keyframes subtleGlow {
  0%, 100% { 
    box-shadow: 0 0 20px rgba(255, 107, 53, 0.1);
  }
  50% { 
    box-shadow: 0 0 30px rgba(255, 107, 53, 0.2);
  }
}

@keyframes fadeInUp {
  from {
    opacity: 0;
    transform: translateY(30px);
  }
  to {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: translateY(0);
  }
}

@keyframes slideInLeft {
  from {
    opacity: 0;
    transform: translateX(-50px);
  }
  to {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: translateX(0);
  }
}

@keyframes slideInRight {
  from {
    opacity: 0;
    transform: translateX(50px);
  }
  to {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: translateX(0);
  }
}

/* Left Column - Welcome Section */
.welcome-section {
  flex: 1;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
  padding: 60px 80px;
  position: relative;
  animation: slideInLeft 1s ease-out;
}

.welcome-content {
  text-align: left;
  max-width: 400px;
  width: 100%;
  animation: fadeInUp 1.2s ease-out 0.3s both;
}

.welcome-section::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background: transparent;
  z-index: -1;
}

/* Right Column - Form Section */
.form-section {
  flex: 1;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
  padding: 60px 80px;
  position: relative;
  animation: slideInRight 1s ease-out 0.2s both;
}

.form-section::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
  backdrop-filter: blur(15px);
  z-index: -1;
}

/* Welcome Text Styling */
.welcome-title {
  font-family: 'League Spartan', sans-serif;
  font-size: 3.5rem;
  font-weight: 700;
  color: white;
  margin-bottom: 24px;
  line-height: 1.1;
}

.welcome-back {
  font-weight: 700;
}

.welcome-subtitle {
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9);
  margin-bottom: 40px;
  line-height: 1.6;
}

.welcome-description {
  font-size: 1rem;
  color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8);
  margin-bottom: 24px;
  line-height: 1.5;
  max-width: 400px;
}

/* Theme Indicator */
.theme-indicator {
  margin-bottom: 40px;
}

.theme-text {
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8);
  font-style: italic;
}

/* Social Links */
.social-links {
  display: flex;
  gap: 16px;
  margin-top: auto;
}

.social-icon {
  width: 40px;
  height: 40px;
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  border-radius: 50%;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
  animation: fadeInUp 1.5s ease-out both;
}

.social-icon:nth-child(1) { animation-delay: 0.8s; }
.social-icon:nth-child(2) { animation-delay: 0.9s; }
.social-icon:nth-child(3) { animation-delay: 1.0s; }
.social-icon:nth-child(4) { animation-delay: 1.1s; }

.social-icon:hover {
  transform: translateY(-5px) scale(1.1);
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
  box-shadow: 0 8px 20px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
}

.social-icon svg {
  width: 24px;
  height: 24px;
}

.social-icon:hover {
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
  border-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5);
  transform: translateY(-2px);
}

/* Form Container */
.login-form-container {
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 400px;
  animation: fadeInUp 1.2s ease-out 0.5s both;
  position: relative;
}

.login-form-container::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: -10px;
  left: -10px;
  right: -10px;
  bottom: -10px;
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.03);
  border-radius: 15px;
  backdrop-filter: blur(5px);
  z-index: -1;
}

/* Form Styling */
.form-title {
  font-size: 2rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: white;
  margin-bottom: 32px;
  text-align: center;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
}

.form-group {
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.form-label {
  display: block;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  font-weight: 500;
  color: white;
  margin-bottom: 8px;
  text-shadow: 1px 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
}

.form-input {
  width: 100% !important;
  padding: 12px 16px !important;
  border: 2px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5) !important;
  border-radius: 8px !important;
  font-size: 1rem !important;
  transition: all 0.3s ease !important;
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.15) !important;
  color: white !important;
  backdrop-filter: blur(10px) !important;
}

.form-input::placeholder {
  color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8) !important;
}

.form-input:focus {
  outline: none !important;
  border-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9) !important;
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 3px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2) !important;
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2) !important;
}

.form-checkbox {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  margin-bottom: 24px;
}

.form-checkbox input {
  margin-right: 8px;
  transform: scale(1.2);
}

.form-checkbox label {
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: 1px 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
}

/* Buttons */
.btn-primary {
  width: auto;
  padding: 12px 24px;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ff6b35, #f7931e);
  color: white;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 8px;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  align-self: flex-start;
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
  box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(255, 107, 53, 0.3);
}

.btn-primary::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: -100%;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  background: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2), transparent);
  transition: left 0.5s;
}

.btn-primary:hover::before {
  left: 100%;
}

.btn-primary:hover {
  transform: translateY(-3px);
  box-shadow: 0 12px 25px rgba(255, 107, 53, 0.5);
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ff7a4a, #ffa726);
}

.password-link {
  margin-top: 6px;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  text-align: left;
}

.password-link .form-link {
  color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8);
  text-decoration: none;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  transition: color 0.3s ease;
}

.password-link .form-link:hover {
  color: white;
  text-decoration: underline;
}

.btn-primary:disabled {
  opacity: 0.6;
  cursor: not-allowed;
  transform: none;
}

/* OAuth Buttons */
.oauth-section {
  margin-top: 24px;
}

.oauth-divider {
  text-align: center;
  margin: 20px 0;
  color: white;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  position: relative;
  text-shadow: 1px 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
}

.oauth-divider::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  height: 1px;
  background: #e1e5e9;
  z-index: 1;
}

.oauth-divider span {
  padding: 0 16px;
  position: relative;
  z-index: 2;
}

.oauth-buttons {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
  gap: 12px;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.btn-oauth {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  padding: 10px 16px;
  border: 2px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
  border-radius: 8px;
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  color: white;
  text-decoration: none;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  font-weight: 500;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  cursor: pointer;
  backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.btn-oauth::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: -100%;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  background: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1), transparent);
  transition: left 0.5s;
}

.btn-oauth:hover::before {
  left: 100%;
}

.btn-oauth:hover {
  border-color: rgba(255, 107, 53, 0.6);
  background: rgba(255, 107, 53, 0.2);
  transform: translateY(-2px);
  box-shadow: 0 8px 20px rgba(255, 107, 53, 0.3);
}

.oauth-icon {
  width: 20px;
  height: 20px;
  margin-right: 8px;
  flex-shrink: 0;
}

/* Form Links */
.form-links {
  text-align: center;
  margin-top: 20px;
}

.form-link {
  color: #ff6b35;
  text-decoration: none;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  font-weight: 500;
  background: none;
  border: none;
  padding: 0;
  cursor: pointer;
}

.form-link:hover {
  text-decoration: underline;
}

.form-toggle {
  margin-top: 16px;
  text-align: center;
}

.form-toggle-text {
  color: white;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  text-shadow: 1px 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
}

/* Turnstile Verification */
.turnstile-verification {
  margin: 20px 0;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 8px; /* space-y-2 equivalent */
}

.turnstile-error {
  color: #dc2626; /* text-red-600 */
  font-size: 0.75rem; /* text-xs */
  text-align: center;
}

#turnstile-widget {
  margin: 0 auto;
}

.flex {
  display: flex;
}

.justify-center {
  justify-content: center;
}

/* Terms Checkbox */
.terms-checkbox {
  display: flex;
  align-items: flex-start;
  margin-bottom: 24px;
}

.terms-checkbox input {
  margin-right: 12px;
  margin-top: 2px;
  transform: scale(1.2);
}

.terms-checkbox label {
  font-size: 0.85rem;
  color: #666;
  line-height: 1.4;
}

.terms-link {
  color: #ff6b35;
  text-decoration: none;
}

.terms-link:hover {
  text-decoration: underline;
}

/* Responsive Design */
@media (max-width: 1024px) {
  .welcome-section,
  .form-section {
    padding: 40px 60px;
  }
  
  .welcome-title {
    font-size: 3rem;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .login-content {
    flex-direction: column;
  }
  
  .welcome-section {
    padding: 40px 30px;
    align-items: center;
  }
  
  .welcome-content {
    text-align: center;
    max-width: none;
  }
  
  .form-section {
    padding: 30px;
  }
  
  .welcome-title {
    font-size: 2.5rem;
  }
  
  .login-form-container {
    padding: 30px;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 480px) {
  .welcome-section,
  .form-section {
    padding: 20px;
  }
  
  .welcome-title {
    font-size: 2rem;
  }
  
  .login-form-container {
    padding: 20px;
  }
  
  .oauth-buttons {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
  }
}

/* Mobile Portrait Background Adjustment */
@media (max-width: 768px) and (orientation: portrait) {
  .cinematic-login-container {
    background-attachment: scroll;
    background-size: cover;
    background-position: center top;
  }
}

/* Loading and Error States */
.loading-overlay {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  z-index: 1000;
}

.loading-spinner {
  width: 40px;
  height: 40px;
  border: 4px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
  border-top: 4px solid #ff6b35;
  border-radius: 50%;
  animation: spin 1s linear infinite;
}

@keyframes spin {
  0% { transform: rotate(0deg); }
  100% { transform: rotate(360deg); }
}

.error-message {
  background: #fee;
  color: #c33;
  padding: 12px 16px;
  border-radius: 8px;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  border: 1px solid #fcc;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}

.success-message {
  background: #efe;
  color: #363;
  padding: 12px 16px;
  border-radius: 8px;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  border: 1px solid #cfc;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}
```

```css
}

  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  height: 1px;
  background: #e1e5e9;
  z-index: 1;
}

  padding: 0 16px;
  position: relative;
  z-index: 2;
}

.oauth-buttons {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
  gap: 12px;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.btn-oauth {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  padding: 10px 16px;
  border: 2px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
  border-radius: 8px;
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  color: white;
  text-decoration: none;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  font-weight: 500;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  cursor: pointer;
  backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.btn-oauth::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: -100%;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  background: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1), transparent);
  transition: left 0.5s;
}

.btn-oauth:hover::before {
  left: 100%;
}

  border-color: rgba(255, 107, 53, 0.6);
  background: rgba(255, 107, 53, 0.2);
  transform: translateY(-2px);
  box-shadow: 0 8px 20px rgba(255, 107, 53, 0.3);
}

.oauth-icon {
  width: 20px;
  height: 20px;
  margin-right: 8px;
  flex-shrink: 0;
}

/* Form Links */
.form-links {
  text-align: center;
  margin-top: 20px;
}

.form-link {
  color: #ff6b35;
  text-decoration: none;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  font-weight: 500;
  background: none;
  border: none;
  padding: 0;
  cursor: pointer;
}

.form-link:hover {
  text-decoration: underline;
}

.form-toggle {
  margin-top: 16px;
  text-align: center;
}

.form-toggle-text {
  color: white;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  text-shadow: 1px 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
}

.turnstile-verification {
  margin: 20px 0;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 8px; /* space-y-2 equivalent */
}

.turnstile-error {
  color: #dc2626; /* text-red-600 */
  font-size: 0.75rem; /* text-xs */
  text-align: center;
}

#turnstile-widget {
  margin: 0 auto;
}

.flex {
  display: flex;
}

.justify-center {
  justify-content: center;
}

/* Terms Checkbox */
.terms-checkbox {
  display: flex;
  align-items: flex-start;
  margin-bottom: 24px;
}

.terms-checkbox input {
  margin-right: 12px;
  margin-top: 2px;
  transform: scale(1.2);
}

.terms-checkbox label {
  font-size: 0.85rem;
  color: #666;
  line-height: 1.4;
}

.terms-link {
  color: #ff6b35;
  text-decoration: none;
}

.terms-link:hover {
  text-decoration: underline;
}

/* Responsive Design */
@media (max-width: 1024px) {
  .welcome-section,
  .form-section {
    padding: 40px 60px;
  }
  
  .welcome-title {
    font-size: 3rem;
  }
```

```css
  background-size: 100% auto;
  background-position: center top;
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-attachment: fixed;
  position: relative;
}

.vvault-sunset-bg::before {
  display: none;
}

/* Sunrise Background - Snowy Pine Landscape with Enhanced Effects */
.vvault-sunrise-bg {
  background-image: url('/assets/vvault_sunrise.png');
  background-size: 100% auto;
  background-position: center top;
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-attachment: fixed;
  position: relative;
}

.vvault-sunrise-bg::before {
  display: none;
}

/* Mobile-specific background adjustments */
@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .cinematic-login-container {
    background-attachment: scroll;
  }
  
  .vvault-sunset-bg,
  .vvault-sunrise-bg {
    background-attachment: scroll;
  }
}

/* Remove fallback gradients - let PNG images show through */

/* Two Column Layout */
.login-content {
  display: flex;
  width: 100%;
  min-height: 100vh;
  position: relative;
  z-index: 2;
  backdrop-filter: blur(0.5px);
}

/* Cinematic Effects */
@keyframes subtleGlow {
  0%, 100% { 
    box-shadow: 0 0 20px rgba(255, 107, 53, 0.1);
  }
  50% { 
    box-shadow: 0 0 30px rgba(255, 107, 53, 0.2);
  }
}

@keyframes fadeInUp {
  from {
    opacity: 0;
    transform: translateY(30px);
  }
  to {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: translateY(0);
  }
}

@keyframes slideInLeft {
  from {
    opacity: 0;
    transform: translateX(-50px);
  }
  to {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: translateX(0);
  }
}

@keyframes slideInRight {
  from {
    opacity: 0;
    transform: translateX(50px);
  }
  to {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: translateX(0);
  }
}

/* Left Column - Welcome Section */
.welcome-section {
  flex: 1;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
  padding: 60px 80px;
  position: relative;
  animation: slideInLeft 1s ease-out;
}

.welcome-content {
  text-align: left;
  max-width: 400px;
  width: 100%;
  animation: fadeInUp 1.2s ease-out 0.3s both;
}

.welcome-section::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background: transparent;
  z-index: -1;
}

/* Right Column - Form Section */
.form-section {
  flex: 1;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
  padding: 60px 80px;
  position: relative;
  animation: slideInRight 1s ease-out 0.2s both;
}

.form-section::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
  backdrop-filter: blur(15px);
  z-index: -1;
}

/* Welcome Text Styling */
.welcome-title {
  font-family: 'League Spartan', sans-serif;
  font-size: 3.5rem;
  font-weight: 700;
  color: white;
  margin-bottom: 24px;
  line-height: 1.1;
}

.welcome-back {
  font-weight: 700;
}

.welcome-subtitle {
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9);
  margin-bottom: 40px;
  line-height: 1.6;
}

.welcome-description {
  font-size: 1rem;
  color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8);
  margin-bottom: 24px;
  line-height: 1.5;
  max-width: 400px;
}

/* Theme Indicator */
.theme-indicator {
  margin-bottom: 40px;
}

.theme-text {
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8);
  font-style: italic;
}

/* Social Links */
.social-links {
  display: flex;
  gap: 16px;
  margin-top: auto;
}

.social-icon {
  width: 40px;
  height: 40px;
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  border-radius: 50%;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
  animation: fadeInUp 1.5s ease-out both;
}

.social-icon:nth-child(1) { animation-delay: 0.8s; }
.social-icon:nth-child(2) { animation-delay: 0.9s; }
.social-icon:nth-child(3) { animation-delay: 1.0s; }
.social-icon:nth-child(4) { animation-delay: 1.1s; }

.social-icon:hover {
  transform: translateY(-5px) scale(1.1);
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
  box-shadow: 0 8px 20px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
}

.social-icon svg {
  width: 24px;
  height: 24px;
}

.social-icon:hover {
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
  border-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5);
  transform: translateY(-2px);
}

/* Form Container */
.login-form-container {
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 400px;
  animation: fadeInUp 1.2s ease-out 0.5s both;
  position: relative;
}

.login-form-container::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: -10px;
  left: -10px;
  right: -10px;
  bottom: -10px;
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.03);
  border-radius: 15px;
  backdrop-filter: blur(5px);
  z-index: -1;
}

/* Form Styling */
.form-title {
  font-size: 2rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: white;
  margin-bottom: 32px;
  text-align: center;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
}

.form-group {
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.form-label {
  display: block;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  font-weight: 500;
  color: white;
  margin-bottom: 8px;
  text-shadow: 1px 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
}

.form-input {
  width: 100% !important;
  padding: 12px 16px !important;
  border: 2px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5) !important;
  border-radius: 8px !important;
  font-size: 1rem !important;
  transition: all 0.3s ease !important;
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.15) !important;
  color: white !important;
  backdrop-filter: blur(10px) !important;
}

.form-input::placeholder {
  color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8) !important;
}

.form-input:focus {
  outline: none !important;
  border-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9) !important;
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 3px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2) !important;
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2) !important;
}

.form-checkbox {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  margin-bottom: 24px;
}

.form-checkbox input {
  margin-right: 8px;
  transform: scale(1.2);
}

.form-checkbox label {
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: 1px 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
}

/* Buttons */
.btn-primary {
  width: auto;
  padding: 12px 24px;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ff6b35, #f7931e);
  color: white;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 8px;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  align-self: flex-start;
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
  box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(255, 107, 53, 0.3);
}

.btn-primary::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: -100%;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  background: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2), transparent);
  transition: left 0.5s;
}

.btn-primary:hover::before {
  left: 100%;
}

.btn-primary:hover {
  transform: translateY(-3px);
  box-shadow: 0 12px 25px rgba(255, 107, 53, 0.5);
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ff7a4a, #ffa726);
}

.password-link {
  margin-top: 6px;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  text-align: left;
}

.password-link .form-link {
  color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8);
  text-decoration: none;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  transition: color 0.3s ease;
}

.password-link .form-link:hover {
  color: white;
  text-decoration: underline;
}

.btn-primary:disabled {
  opacity: 0.6;
  cursor: not-allowed;
  transform: none;
}

/* OAuth Buttons */
.oauth-section {
  margin-top: 24px;
}

.oauth-divider {
  text-align: center;
  margin: 20px 0;
  color: white;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  position: relative;
  text-shadow: 1px 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
}

.oauth-divider::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  height: 1px;
  background: #e1e5e9;
  z-index: 1;
}

.oauth-divider span {
  padding: 0 16px;
  position: relative;
  z-index: 2;
}

.oauth-buttons {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
  gap: 12px;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.btn-oauth {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  padding: 10px 16px;
  border: 2px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
  border-radius: 8px;
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  color: white;
  text-decoration: none;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  font-weight: 500;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  cursor: pointer;
  backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.btn-oauth::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: -100%;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  background: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1), transparent);
  transition: left 0.5s;
}

.btn-oauth:hover::before {
  left: 100%;
}

.btn-oauth:hover {
  border-color: rgba(255, 107, 53, 0.6);
  background: rgba(255, 107, 53, 0.2);
  transform: translateY(-2px);
  box-shadow: 0 8px 20px rgba(255, 107, 53, 0.3);
}

.oauth-icon {
  width: 20px;
  height: 20px;
  margin-right: 8px;
  flex-shrink: 0;
}

/* Form Links */
.form-links {
  text-align: center;
  margin-top: 20px;
}

.form-link {
  color: #ff6b35;
  text-decoration: none;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  font-weight: 500;
  background: none;
  border: none;
  padding: 0;
  cursor: pointer;
}

.form-link:hover {
  text-decoration: underline;
}

.form-toggle {
  margin-top: 16px;
  text-align: center;
}

.form-toggle-text {
  color: white;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  text-shadow: 1px 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
}

/* Turnstile Verification */
.turnstile-verification {
  margin: 20px 0;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 8px; /* space-y-2 equivalent */
}

.turnstile-error {
  color: #dc2626; /* text-red-600 */
  font-size: 0.75rem; /* text-xs */
  text-align: center;
}

#turnstile-widget {
  margin: 0 auto;
}

.flex {
  display: flex;
}

.justify-center {
  justify-content: center;
}

/* Terms Checkbox */
.terms-checkbox {
  display: flex;
  align-items: flex-start;
  margin-bottom: 24px;
}

.terms-checkbox input {
  margin-right: 12px;
  margin-top: 2px;
  transform: scale(1.2);
}

.terms-checkbox label {
  font-size: 0.85rem;
  color: #666;
  line-height: 1.4;
}

.terms-link {
  color: #ff6b35;
  text-decoration: none;
}

.terms-link:hover {
  text-decoration: underline;
}

/* Responsive Design */
@media (max-width: 1024px) {
  .welcome-section,
  .form-section {
    padding: 40px 60px;
  }
  
  .welcome-title {
    font-size: 3rem;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .login-content {
    flex-direction: column;
  }
  
  .welcome-section {
    padding: 40px 30px;
    align-items: center;
  }
  
  .welcome-content {
    text-align: center;
    max-width: none;
  }
  
  .form-section {
    padding: 30px;
  }
  
  .welcome-title {
    font-size: 2.5rem;
  }
  
  .login-form-container {
    padding: 30px;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 480px) {
  .welcome-section,
  .form-section {
    padding: 20px;
  }
  
  .welcome-title {
    font-size: 2rem;
  }
  
  .login-form-container {
    padding: 20px;
  }
  
  .oauth-buttons {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
  }
}

/* Mobile Portrait Background Adjustment */
@media (max-width: 768px) and (orientation: portrait) {
  .cinematic-login-container {
    background-attachment: scroll;
    background-size: cover;
    background-position: center top;
  }
}

/* Loading and Error States */
.loading-overlay {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  z-index: 1000;
}

.loading-spinner {
  width: 40px;
  height: 40px;
  border: 4px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
  border-top: 4px solid #ff6b35;
  border-radius: 50%;
  animation: spin 1s linear infinite;
}

@keyframes spin {
  0% { transform: rotate(0deg); }
  100% { transform: rotate(360deg); }
}

.error-message {
  background: #fee;
  color: #c33;
  padding: 12px 16px;
  border-radius: 8px;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  border: 1px solid #fcc;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}

.success-message {
  background: #efe;
  color: #363;
  padding: 12px 16px;
  border-radius: 8px;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  border: 1px solid #cfc;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}
```
